title: Hearing Test
description:
Pure-tone audiometry is the basic hearing examination which determines the degree of hearing loss in relation to the sound frequency.

Hearing Test features:
* pure tone audiometry using bundled headphones and predefined calibration coefficients from the database (possible for systematically increasing number of devices),
* calibration of the device (in the case of lack of predefined coefficients or for headphones other than bundled).

Additional features:
* viewing tests results,
* adding notes to the tests results,
* printing of the tests results,
* adjustment of calibration (calibration coefficients may be adjusted on the basis of your audiogram produced using an audiometer).
* verification of calibration coefficients,
* suppressing of the masking noise for the purpose of free field audiometry.

The test consists in determining the quietest sound that you are able to hear, thus determining your hearing threshold. The risk is minimal and the test can be stopped at any time.

summary: Perform a pure-tone audiometry on your mobile device.
recentChanges:
New features (version 27):
* bug fixes
New features (version 22):
* implementation of the Android security updates
* bug fixes
New features (version 15):
* customization of the test frequencies,
* support for high frequency audiometry,
* estimation of the "hearing age",
* audiogram interpretation: age norms, speech banana,
* optional hiding of results when tested,
* support for new versions of Android: material design, permission adjustments, documents printing
comments: Good test ....BUT just a warning. It will change the volume settings on your phone. For me it left them on MAX, so I got painfully blasted out by my earphones when i went on to listen to music after running a hearing test. Really not good!

I really like idea .. but can it actually replace pure tone audiometry(although bone conduction not possible)..if yes then even paying a premium shouldn't be a problem Since we are using frequencies , what about monosyllables and checking speech reception threshold , speech discrimination score, sisi score, tone decay test. It doesn't need to be the exact thing ..just something that could be performed easily on opd hours as a screening

There are no instructions! Do I hold down 'I Can Hear" until the beeping stops or tap for each beep? Do I have to hit 'I Cannot Hear' once the beeping stops or can I just stop pressing 'I Can Hear'? When do I hit the Barely Audible button - when the sound is actually barely audible or is this just a badly named Confirm/Next button? Also I would prefer to use the Hide Results option but you cant pause. If I go into settings to select Hide Result, I miss beeps.

Works good. But the results can be deviated to the better ear thresholds if the person has asymmetrical thresholds. For eg. left ear has severe and right has normal hearing , the app displays erroneous results in poorer ear. Any suggestion for presentation of noise to better ear to avoid its participation?
This is wonderful, easy to read and use. it's results are closely accurate too. However I would suggest that naming of files should be enabled in the app to aid file differentiation. Thank you.

title: AudioCardio: Ear Training and Hearing Test
description:
AudioCardio’s data and science backed solution allows you to check your hearing and generate a personalized sound therapy (inaudible) that aims to maintain and strengthen your ears.
 
Our proprietary sound therapy is like physical therapy for your hearing. It's a once a day, one hour, sound therapy (inaudible) that you can use while doing other activities like listening to music or watching tv.
 
“...potential to revolutionize the way hearing loss is treated.”- Health Radar
 
“...works like physical therapy for your ears!”- CNET
 
“I’ve been wearing my hearing aids for more than a decade...the longer I use the app the better I can hear! - Robert F., 74” - Health Radar
 
Using Threshold Sound Conditioning™ technology (TSC), our sound therapy stimulates the inner ear cells to target damaged hearing for each ear.
 
TSC technology was clinically proven with:
 
Stanford Univ.
Samsung Medical Center
Palo Alto Medical Foundation
Nanjing Univ.
Chung Ang Univ.
 
APP FEATURES
 
• Sound therapy that aims to help maintain, protect and strengthen hearing
• Fast hearing check that creates a personalized sound therapy for your ears
• Generates hearing score, usage metrics and identifies targeted frequencies for each ear
• Integrates with music, streaming services and other daily activities
 
Allows you to test hearing, create a personalized sound therapy, track progress for each ear and can be used as a complementary solution to your hearing aid (s).
 
This is not a clinical hearing test, but it is a great way to do an initial hearing screening to better understand your hearing loss, promote better ear health, and healthy hearing habits.
 
Over 450M people suffer from hearing loss and over 300M people suffer from tinnitus or ringing in the ears. Tinnitus can be a symptom of hearing loss and hearing loss is a problem that often goes undiagnosed. It is known as an invisible disease / disability. Current solutions like hearing aids and are hard to access or too expensive for a majority of the population with hearing loss. This may be why people wait an average of 7 years before they get a hearing test from a hearing health professional.
 
SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
 
AudioCardio offers 3 auto-renewing subscription options:
 
$14.99 /mo
$64.99 6 months
$99.99 per year
Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your Google Play Store Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.
 
This price is for the United States. Pricing in other countries vary and may be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence.
 
Terms & Conditions
https://audiocardio.com/terms-of-use-terms/
 
Privacy Policy
https://audiocardio.com/audio-cardio-privacy-policy/
 
*Disclaimer*
This isn’t a clinical hearing test. This should be considered a hearing check or screening and cannot be used to prescribe a hearing aid. It should only be used as a method to see if you may have hearing loss since it is not a clinical hearing test.
 
This isn’t a medical device and hasn’t been reviewed by the FDA as a hearing loss solution. It’s not intended to self-diagnose any disease, injury or disability like tinnitus or hearing loss. If you believe you have hearing loss or tinnitus, please consult your doctor, or other qualified healthcare professional before using this app. Use this app at your own risk. AudioCardio™ does not take responsibility for direct or indirect damage that could result from its use.

summary: Hearing Test and Ear Training That Improves Your Ability to Hear Familiar Sounds
recentChanges: Minor design updates
comments: I have tinnitus and I find that this app helps to calm it down and make it less volatile. I also did experience a 10 db improvement in 2 frequencies in my left ear, which is my worse ear. I got the improvement though by just focusing one frequency. I personally beleive the "cardio" helps to link still intact hair cells in the ear to synapse nerves that may have been damaged. Definately worth the 2 week trial. Use it everyday, at least one hour per day. You should see a good result!

Great app for hearing loss. My son told me about it and after using it for about 4 weeks I'm noticing a HUGE DIFFERENCE! Admittedly I wasnt using it everyday, but even 4/5 days a weeks ended up helping my hearing. Def worth a shot and there's a free trial too. Hoping this keeps improving my hearing.

I experienced a huge increase in tinnitus after only one session. This doesn't help restore hearing for me, it only increases the ringing in my ears. Did not expect this side effect. Please put a warning in the description.
Simply a amazing app who knew that I could improve my hearing by exercising my hearing with audio frequencies.

I used to go to a lot of concerts and noticed it affected my hearing. I started using AudioCardio to help with my hearing loss due to excessive loud noise and have noticed that I’m not straining to hear as much.

title: Ear Booster - Better Hearing: Mobile Hearing Aid
description:
Do you have hearing problems, or just want to hear the things which other people cannot hear? Then this is the perfect application for you.

Ear booster allows your to improve your hearing, by using your android device as a hearing aid. Just plug in your headset, and start to hear better.

Select which audio source, the application should use, and get the best audio quality.

To use this application a headset is required. Not using a headset will result in a terrible feedback.

Improve your hearing today, with this super awesome and simple app!.

How to use:

Start up the application and plug in a headset. Press the power on button, to start hearing the world around you. Use the equalizer for fine tuning, and use the options button to reduce noise and echo.

The main intent for this application is to function as a hearing aid.

This application can probably also be used for ghost hunting. You may be able to use it to hear conversations from the other side.

Includes:
+ Super simple user interface.
+ Equalizer for fine tuning.
+ Noise suppressor.
+ Multiple Audio Sources.
+ User notifications.
+ Works in background.
+ Record the audio.

Please act responsibly when you are using this application.

If you like this application, please leave a review and a rating


*** Important Notice ***

The application requires the following permissions





Permission to access internet is only to display ads, nothing more.

Permissions for audio, is to allow the app to use the microphone of the device which is to improve the user's hearing.

This application does not store any information about the user. We a Zygne Apps respect the user's privacy.

This application is perfect for people who cannot hear too well. Plug in a headset, activate the application and improve your hearing immediately.

recentChanges: Experimental : Select between hardware microphone or headset microphone
comments: It's a great boon to people like me, who need a hearing aid. This app is a great one. But off late, I changed my phone fro Lenovo to Samsung A10S, and I am not able to hear once the mobile goes on standby mode. Could you please suggest a solution?
Excellent app - I rarely bother to rate apps but I felt like I needed to.

This app offers a wider spectrum of frequency to base it's EQ on. With the Ear Booster hearing amplification application, you can calibrate your phone and effectively pinpoint even distant whispers ,when done correctly. Think of this app like the "PREDATOR" movie heat vision .Each iteration of frequency offers a different EQ to customize. You can use a Bluetooth headset and use the built in microphone physically located on the phone as your input location. This app is the best I've found yet

I don't know if I can recommend this app, even though it works really well.  The things that discourage me is that 1. It doesn't appear with my applications, which I normally associate with dodgy software.  I had to look up the app on Play Store again and uninstall it from there.  2. It runs on my phone continuously, even when the app is closed.  Enabling noise cancelling activates the sound boost instead, and when I make or receive a phone call, it also boosts the volume of my voice and the sounds around me.

it's nice that I can hear some things but I can only here muffled sounds even with said "noise maker" directly in front of me. Also, I attempted recording like it says possible. However, there are no audio files no matter where I look or any other sort of file that can produce sound.

title: Petralex Hearing Aid App
descriptionHTML:
Hear without any limits!
The hearing aid app restores your sound perception to the natural level.
Now you can hear even the whispers with hearing amplifier.

Petralex Hearing Aid will automatically adjust to specific features of your hearing.
Use the power of your smartphone and latest technologies for maximum sound amplifier.
No registration and no advertisements.
You only need a simple headset in order to use this hearing app.

Hundreds of thousands of hearing impaired people have chosen Petralex to solve their hearing problems.
The application was chosen as Microsoft Inspire P2P contest winner in 2017.

FEATURES (FREE):
-- Automatic adjustment to hearing specifics;
-- Hearing correction for each ear;
-- Adaptation to different types of environment;
-- Amplify up to 30 dB with a wired headset;
-- Built-in hearing test;
-- Dynamic compression. Amplify quiet sounds without losing the overall volume;
-- Using 4 options of sound amplifier;
-- Using the built-in 4-week adaptive course for getting used to the hearing aid app;
-- You can use your smartphone as a remote mic;
-- Support of Bluetooth headsets*.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION OFFERS ADVANCED POSSIBILITIES (TRIAL):
-- “Super Boost” - powerful sound amplifier;
-- Players with sound amplifier;
-- Ability to create an unlimited number of profiles for different sound situations;
-- Regulated noise suppression – eliminates background noise, increases speech intelligibility;
-- Modern Dectone amplification method, that amplify sound even better. Advanced hearing test;
-- Profile editing – fine adjustment of hearing aid app;
-- Amplification formula for quiet sounds in case of tinnitus;
-- Additional applications with sound amplifier;
-- Audio recorder/Dictaphone - amplify sound to your hearing.

Choose from one of the following subscription options:
-- weekly subscription
-- monthly subscription
-- annual subscription

IT TAKES TIME TO GET USED TO ANY HEARING AID! BE READY FOR:
-- Adaptation to any hearing aid takes from several weeks to several months;
-- You will hear sounds and noises that you have not heard before. Use the built-in noise reduction function;
-- Some familiar sounds can acquire with metallic aftersound, which can cause temporary discomfort;

USE THE BUILT-IN 4-WEEK ADAPTIVE COURSE FOR GETTING USED TO THE HEARING AID APP.

*Using Bluetooth
NOTE! Using Bluetooth headset brings additional delay to sound transmission.
Possible echoing can appear.

Disclaimer:
The Petralex Hearing Aid® is not approved as a medical device or software and cannot be used as a hearing aid with doctor`s (ENT) prescription.
Hearing test provided in the application can be used only for hearing app adjustment. Hearing test results are not a substitute for professional audiology tests (ENT consultation required).
The Service offers a free 7-day trial so that you can find out more about its capabilities and make sure it suits your needs. It is presupposed that this period of time is enough to decide whether you want to continue or stop using the Service. For this reason, the Service does not process the refund requests for the purchase effected after the free 7-day trial.

Have questions, feedback or suggestions? Reach out to us at support@petralex.pro

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
-- Terms of service: https://petralex.pro/page/terms
-- Privacy policy: https://petralex.pro/page/policy
summary: Hearing Aid - Hearing amplifier
recentChanges:
In the 3.7.2 we improved the app stability and fixed crashes.
Keep your feedback coming! Write us at info@petralex.pro and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.
comments: Honestly the best app for enhancing hearing I've tried
Great app. Many useful features.
Great hearing application for me and friends
I'm very pleased with how clear sound Comes in

I used this app with a Samsung Galaxy 8+ with Aftershokz headphones. I downloaded the app because of the good reviews. When I used it there was a popping noise while trying to hear the TV or my wife talking and what I did hear was delayed like a echo. I went into a quiet room with no background noise and the popping sound did not go away...I even tried different headphones. I was hoping this app would help with my hearing...I'm glad it works for some! Billy O.

title: Deaf Communication (talk to deaf& hard of hearing)
description:
Gone are the days when you needed to write down everything on a piece of paper or learn sign languages to communicate with deaf and hearing impaired people.This speech to text app was made specifically as a conversation platform and not as a speech dictation platform to communicate efficiently and as quickly as possible with people who don't know sign language.Whenever you want to hear something from someone,just tell them to speak to the phone,the app then automatically generates the voice into text so that you can read what they are trying say.Also,the app deletes the previous text automatically when they say something new(So that it doesn't seem like you are reading a book with a bunch of text).if you want talk back then write on the app whatever you want to say and press the speaker button(on the right side of the mic button) and it will generate the text to speech.


Features:
-No more tan 3 ads per day
=Two way communication(speech to text and text to speech).
-it supports over 140 different languages
-Users are given the freedom of selecting a text size of their own choice
-There is an offline mode to access the voice to text app offline by downloading and installing languages(only in pro version)
-Users can copy the text to clipboard
-A simple and beautiful user interface.

comments: Works O.K. but wish could set pause time. It stops recording way to soon, constantly having to hit mic button. Update: 4 months later. Downgraded a bit and uninstalled. It stll times out way too fast. Still 3 stars because it would probably work well for auctioneers.
Deaf communication is the best app for deaf peoples. Who has no hearing ability. This app helps me to hear and understand what people say. Highly recommend this app.

title: Hearing test, Audiogram
descriptionHTML:
It is hard to realize that you have problems with your hearing. Regular monitoring of your hearing with the help of our application can assess the level of your hearing and reduce the anxiety you feel thinking about its condition.

FEATURES:
-- graphic representation of test results and text description;
-- test hearing conducted with the help of 8 tone signals of different frequencies (from 125 Hz to 8000 Hz);
-- control of hearing changes by comparison with previous results;
-- comparison of test results with the norm for your age;
-- comparison of test results with results of another person;
-- sending test results by email to a doctor;
-- exporting test results for automatic adjustment of the application Petralex hearing aid.

Note (denial of responsibility):
The application is not a piece of medical equipment or software with corresponding certification and does not replace hearing test conducted by a specialist. The results of test hearing in the Application cannot be used as a basis for diagnosis.
summary: Hearing analyzer. Ear age test
recentChanges:
In the 2.0.1 we improved the app stability and fixed crashes.
-- Quick test – just 2 minutes
-- Advanced Hearing Test
-- Personal recommendations
-- User-friendly results
comments: Easy and straight forward to do the actual test but the results are confusing. I said I have worse hearing than most people my age but all the little icons were green so what makes it worse??

It works as expected, nevertheless its accuracy could be improved by separating the various test steps with a visual cue. Sometimes one reacts with delay due to distraction or surprise effects, therefore a monitoring of the delays could give an indication whether its better to redo the test for a consistent result.

does exactly what it says. no adverts. I recommend to exchange the headphones round from left to right and try again to minimise the effect of unbalanced volume if any and compare the results. well done..

The tests begin at an audible level, then ramp up quickly, making the result irrelevant. However, there's lots of analysis to put results in context. It's a very slick design, but the guy who ordered the screens should probably be doing something else for a while.
Thanks, I one day noticed that my earphones right side sounded louder I did some research and them found that maybe I had hearing loss. I came to this and now I know that I have slight hearing loss.

title: HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier
description:
HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier is the ultimate super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier to amplify and boost sound from surroundings for better hearing or super hearing. The super hearing aid and hearing amplifier amplifies microphone sound from your surroundings for super hearing. 

HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier features let you amplify external sound coming through microphone, augment and filter noise from sound, and stream the magnified sound to wired or Bluetooth headset for super hearing. The hearing amplifier lets you hear the amplified sound using wired or Bluetooth headset, headphones, earbuds and earphones. 

The hearing aid features of HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier make it possible to amplify sound by placing your phone near sound sources. Use this super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier to amplify and boost sound from devices and gadgets such as Television (TV), Radio, Speaker, Laptop, etc. for super hearing while you relax, work out, or do your daily tasks. This super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier can also be used as an alternative hearing aid when you lose your prescribed medical hearing aid device from your audiologist or ear physician.

HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier adjusts and boost output quality of sound feedback. The hearing amplifier helps restore normal hearing levels against hearing loss to help you hear better, communicate effectively, listen to natural sounds like birds chirping, know what's going on around you and eliminate danger. The powerful hearing amplifier utilizes the powerful audio features of android to bring you super hearing based on your phone's capabilities.

WHY HEARMAX SUPER HEARING AID AMPLIFIER?
1. Hear better during conversations and meetings.
2. Ear agent for super hearing during events where the speaker is far away.
3. Amplify sound from Television, Radio, Speaker, Laptop, etc.
4. Hearing aid to restore normal hearing levels against hearing loss.
5. Temporary hearing aid app when you lose your medical hearing aid.
6. Experience super hearing on android.

FEATURES OF HEARMAX SUPER HEARING AID AMPLIFIER:
1. High-Quality Sound Feedback
2. Powerful Sound Amplifier
3. Acoustic Echo Cancellation (AEC)
4. Equalizer & Presets
5. Bass Booster (BB)
6. Automatic Gain Control (AGC)
7. MP3 Sound Recorder
8. Graphic Virtualizer
9. Volume Controller
10. Noise Suppression
11. Wave Visualizer
12. Save your configurations

HOW TO USE HEARMAX
1. Connect headset or earphones to your smartphone. If you're using a Bluetooth or wireless headset, ensure Bluetooth is on and your hearing device is properly connected to your phone. You can play music to test its functionality.

2. Launch HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier and tap "Listen" for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound into your headset.

3. Put your phone near any source of sound for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound in real-time.

4. Listen to the amplified sound using your hearing device.

Disclaimer: Use HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier for the purpose of amplified hearing, not as a replacement for your prescribed medical hearing aid device from your audiologist. Consult your physician if you're encountering any hearing difficulty.

2. Launch HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier and tap "Listen" for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound into your headset.

3. Put your phone near any source of sound for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound in real-time.

4. Listen to the amplified sound using your hearing device.

Disclaimer: Use HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier for the purpose of amplified hearing, not as a replacement for your prescribed medical hearing aid device from your audiologist. Consult your physician if you're encountering any hearing difficulty.

Be ok to leave your device next to others to hear better but delayed Shame, would be a good app if they get rid of the DELAY .I won't be using it but if that gets fixed be good.

title: Super Hearing Sound Magnifier
description:
Super Hearing Sound Magnifier is designed to filter and amplify sound and boost environmental hearing, especially people with hearing loss. 

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier uses headphone microphone and phone microphone to detect and amplify sound from your surroundings to help you hear better.

Use Super Hearing Sound Magnifier to boost sound from devices such as Television, Radio, Speaker, Laptop, etc. and improve sound clarity during recreational activities like bird-watching.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier can be used in classrooms, churches, meetings, conferences or any setting where you are a distance away from the speaker. It supports Bluetooth and wired headsets.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier fine-tunes, augments and amplifies sound to help you communicate effectively and eliminate danger. 

The hearing amplifier’s sound amplification improves your ability to hear sound without disturbing sleepers.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier helps individuals with hearing loss hear better in small group settings and one-on-one conversations.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier is an everyday companion for millions of people during conversations at work, and with friends and family.

Use Bluetooth headphones to avoid carrying your phone around.
 
WHY USE SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER
1. Proper hearing leads to better communication.
2. Hearing well leads to positive attitude towards life.
3. Better sound produces better music and video experience.
4. Hearing using Bluetooth connection lets you put your phone away.
5. Better hearing lowers stress levels.
6. Hearing well makes you confident.
7. Enhanced hearing lets you grab opportunities and makes you successful.
8. Better hearing gives the right orientation.
9. Amplified sound lets you detect danger and understand speech.
10. Enjoy natural sounds like birds chirping or leaves rustling.
11. Restore normal hearing levels to help eradicate hearing loss.

FEATURES OF SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER
1. High-Quality Sound Feedback
2. Echo Cancellation
3. Noise Suppression
4. Sound Recorder
5. Loudness Enhancement
6. Bass Booster
7. Save Configurations
8. Regular Updates

Disclaimer: Super Hearing Sound Magnifier is not a replacement for medical hearing aids, so always use your medical hearing aid. Consult your audiologist if you’re experiencing hearing loss.

title: Ear Scout: Super Hearing
description:
The ultimate super hearing app.

Put on some Bluetooth headphones, click on the center button, and you can hear what your phone's microphone is picking up. It's also possible to set up a noise-trigger for audio recordings and have them sent to your email.

Whether you want to responsibly audio-monitor your environment, hear the TV and conversations better (non-medical hearing aid), or just listen to birdsong from indoors, Ear Scout amplifies and streams the audio from the mic to your Bluetooth headset (mic-to-headphone) in real time for remote super hearing.

HEADPHONES REQUIRED. To avoid awful audio feedback you need to use headphones.

SAFETY FEATURE. After starting the app the volume increases gently to the set level. This way you have time to adjust to high gain settings from the previous session.

REVIEWS: Please review the app if you try it.

Ear Scout amplifies sound coming through your phone's microphone straight to your earphones (direct mic-to-headphones audio routing). To fine-tune the incoming signal, use the audio equalizer.

DISCLAIMER. This app is for non-harmful remote hearing via Bluetooth (e.g. listening to nature / property monitoring) and sound amplification (non-medical hearing aid), not to listen in on private conversations. Please use Ear Scout responsibly.

Don't forget to leave a review.

summary: Ear Scout amplifies sound from the mic to your headphones for super hearing.
comments: I was impressed with this app! I expected it to be another cheesy app falsely advertising like the majority off apps out there. To my surprise it did exactly what it said, better even. I was able to hear ALL sounds, much better and louder than I figured. I definitely recommend this app to anyone who needs it.

Bad ass!!! I can LITERALLY hear everything!!! Perfect if you're looking for that, "fly on the wall," effect on something happening a couple rooms away with a loud ass football game and music on. I could still hear a whispered conversation in that environment I just described up above.

**My actual rating for this app is 4.75 stars** The app does an amazing job of picking up and amplifying the sounds in the area your device is located! Not only was I gifted with super-human hearing but it gave me a measure of clairevoyancy (predicting future occurrences fairly accurately) as well...let me briefly explain. Using this app I was able to tell, with practice, who was approaching my room, who was ordering food in the next room and who was about to enter the house.

So, I guess if you're looking to go deaf by listening to all the high-pitched sounds you DON'T want to hear while not being able to hear ANY of the sounds you might actually WANT to hear, this app is for you. As a chauffeur for a limo company, I had planned to use it to amplify the voices of my soft-spoken clients when I am in the larger vehicles. Yeah, right! That will not work!

At times, I use this app multiple times a day. I only gave it 4 stars regarding my timing because there is no warning as to when I'll get next to another device n I'm suddenly wondering about the loud screech that's blinding me. Not to often but does happen.

title: Super Ear Ultimate Hearing: live speaker
description:
Super Ear Ultimate Hearing: live speaker attempts to improve your hearing with the power of Android.
Depending on how good your phone is, it can become a high-powered listening device.

NOTE: This is not a replacement for a hearing aid. It should only be used to assist you and is not a medical device.

NOTE: This is not a surveillance device. It augments your hearing only.


Click the button on bottom, and you can hear the world around you.
 Use it to observe your surroundings and monitor what is going on.

Whether you want to listen to nature, have a conversation, or just hear the TV better,
Super Ear Ultimate Hearing: live speaker aims to give you super hearing.
 There's more going on around you than you might realize. It's time to hear it.

HEADPHONES REQUIRED. Failure to use headphones will result in awful audio feedback. You have been warned!

NOTE ON REVIEWS: Please review the app if you try it. But I know you hate leaving reviews . . . because I hate leaving reviews.
 So, if you can think of nothing to say . . .just leave a review saying "Rad" if you love it or "Bogus" if you hate it. 
 Or, just say "Eh" if you have no opinion. However, I love full and honest reviews as they really help us . . . but anything is good. 
 Five stars would be awesome. Now, back to what the app does . . . .


Super Ear Ultimate Hearing: live speaker amplifies the sound coming through your phone microphone straight to your earphones.
 To fine-tune the incoming signal, use the graphic audio equalizer to tactically tune into your surrounding environment.

Perfect for the inquisitive person within you who wants to hear new things. 

Upgrade to the pro version for some great added benefits:
--An extended Graphic Equalizer (more than 5 bands if your phone permits it)
--Echo Cancellation (AEC)
--Noise Suppression (NS)
--Virtualizer
--Automatic Gain Control (AGC)
--MP3 Recording
--Home Screen Widget
--Ad-Free !

summary: Super hearing tool
comments: Way better then all the other apps out there. You can actually hear a rubber band stretching. With this app.. I wish it was free. But after the first day. It wants you to suscribe.

It's a great idea to try and pull off, but my phone (Samsung A50) already has a hearing aid in the accessibility settings. Nice try though. When I use this app it uses the mic on my headphones which makes it screech like a digital dying song or something.

Didnt care for this app. Better ones out there. Valume was way to low and had a little lag. Needs improvement. Simple ui was the best part. Might be better on other devices. Will not pay for pro untill they make changes

Excellent for the hard of hearing This is a great app for those times when I forget to bring a spare battery and my hearing amplifier goes dead. The sound is accurately reproduced and not garbled at all. Like every other hearing app, there is a lag of about a second, but this can be overcome by using a BT headset or plug-in headphones. With both ears covered, you don't notice the lag nearly as much.

I tried other apps. This one's the best. My 91 year old mother spent most of the day in urgent care because she's lost most her hearing. Could not have a conversation and TV was so loud it would drive me out of the house. I put the ear buds in her ear and she could hear me talk in a normal voice anywhere in the house. TV is perfect for her on setting 9 instead of 40. She perked up and smiles. She's like she was 10 years ago. Thank you

title: Talk to deaf
description:
If one of your friends or loved ones is deaf or has a hearing impairment, it is quite difficult to communicate with them.

With this app you can use your phone to translate your speech into text.
The deaf person can then easily read your message.

Talk to deaf contains the following functions:
+ Voice input and automatic translation into text
+ Text entry using the keyboard for entering answers
+ Font can be enlarged and reduced as desired
+ the history can be deleted

title: Check Your Hearing
description:
Welcome to the Check Your Hearing app for Android devices,

A pure frequency hearing test is depend on the famus test which is calld Pure Tone Audiometry (PTA), It is a quick way to measure how strong your hearing is in both ears. In just a few minutes, you can test your ability to distinguish different pure frequencies at a certain loudness.

We recommend testing in a quiet area without interruption. You will have to do a hearing test with the headphones.

The test is based on finding your hearing threshold, which is the lowest audio you can hear at the frequencies listed on the scan page.

The test may show hearing impairment, especially at low or high frequencies, and this is very normal for anyone, as the normal hearing of a person is often very strong between the frequencies 250 and up to 6000, which is the level of speech heard by the human ear.

You should know that this test was done with the help of an audiologist and does not involve any risks and it is a quick way to measure your hearing and we do not recommend relying only on the results of this test as an alternative to visiting an otologist. If you think you have a hearing loss or loss, we recommend that you consult a hearing care professional for a more comprehensive examination.

Add 64 bit feature
Improve some graphics and operations
comments: Good. I also tried 2 other highly rated similar apps and while those 2 gave pretty much the same all around result, this over had a vastly different result that the others for the highest frequency. I don't know if that means this one is more accurate than those 2, or less accurate than those 2.
Very good application to judge your hearing

Being a patient of SSHL SSD, I can say this is most appropriate app to understand your hearing ability. (If you know how to read audiometry graph well and good, the app takes care of it by displaying info screen).This is no nsense app, exactly does and says what your audiometry Doctor does and say. No confusion, excellent app.

Love this App and it is pretty accurate compared to all the tests I have done in my ENT office, the o ly problem is that you cannot keep a history of your tests. I have also recently changed my phone and it seems that at lower decibels the tone changes instead of going silent.
of the several apps ive tried this came out on top for being easy to use causing greater accuracy in recording the results....good work

title: Best Hearing Aid App: Super Ear Tool
description:
We are presenting hearing aid app for those people who have hearing range problem which cannot let the people to hear sound clearly. Many people buy devices for this purpose to hear sound clearly. Super hearing is very useful solution if one having hearing troubles or if someone forgets his hearing aid device.

Hearing solution is a super tool that helps you in easy listening. You need to have Bluetooth handsets or headphones/ hands free to use hearing aid app. Just click the start button in ear booster app and place the mobile within the range of Bluetooth to listen sound louder while putting headphones in your ear.This app is helpful for sound amplification.

Using hearing aid app you can listen whatever you want to listen. Ear assist provides best clear sound quality makes you feel like having a super ear. Even if you want to listen sound from a large distance like from another room you need to have a Bluetooth headphones connected to ear scout app and place the device safely near the audio source.
Superheroes have super powers, what do you have? Now you can proudly say that ear assist app makes my ear a superhero ear! I mean super ear.

You can use this app in many different ways. If you want to listen TV shows while not disturbing anyone in the room. Turn down the TV volume, connect ear booster app to your Bluetooth headphones or earpiece and place hearing aid app near the TV.
You can also listen to your lectures while sitting at the last bench of the class using super hearing app.

Hearing assistance app functionality is similar to hearing aid device or ear assist which captures sound from the mic of the phone and takes it to your ear without any delay and makes you feel like having a super ear.

Key Features of Application:

 Enhance the hearing quality by amplifying sound from surrounding
 Visualizer is added to show the intensity of sound
 You can hear sounds more clearly using hearing aid app
 Control the volume of the sounds and voices from with ear scout
 Offline and free app

Important Notice:
You can enhance the performance via using Bluetooth/headset for sound amplification (non-medical hearing aid), This ear booster does not makes you to listen in private conversations. Deep hearing app is not deliberate to be used for spying or secretly listen to a conversation. It’s just a super ear tool. Do not mix up hearing assist app as a spy app and do not engage in spying on someone's private conversation using this hearing-amplifier. Spying on people secret conversation is not a part of our service provided in super hearing app. You are supposed to hear clear and better using Bluetooth hearing assistance. Moreover this clear audible hearing tool does not permit you to save the recording for preventing its unlawful use.
Don’t forget to rate, share and review if you like this app. Also give us your feedback and tell us more exciting features at appdesignerspro@gmail.com to be part of our next update.

Performance Enhanced
comments: It works except... Big problem is sound latency. It makes conversion difficult because the sound is behind by about 1/2 seconds. You also have to turn it off to say anything because the sound latency make it very difficult to speak. And it is difficult follow other people when they speak because their lips are out of sync with the sound. Fix this and it would be a 5 star rating.

Super ear allows me to experience the best of the best audible clear sounds. With ear scout new equalizer setting hearing to little sounds becomes more easy. No dealy or such thing occured. Definitely going to use this application for a very long time.

I've used many hearing aid apps, this hearing aid application is one of the top hearing applications I've ever found. I was looking an app to enhances my hearing quality. Highly recommend this hearing aid application. Thank you!

I was trying to test it with you tube. The only thing that I could get to work was the volume. I have aux out to a nice pair of gaming headphones with the mic switch off. Everything else like the EQ settings, the bass, the 3D, none of that worked. Furthermore I was getting this app to try to boost the upper mids and highs in my right ear. No panning option available. I'm on a Galaxy S7, that is optimized and updated often.
App works well, except shortly after my screen locks it stops working entirely until I turn it off and back on again. Would be 5 star if that didn't happen.

summary: Deaf grandmother and application to talk. You input voice and display text.
comments: Very impressed with this app. My mum has recently become deaf & this app has helped me to communicate with her. What has impressed me most, is that she's currently in hospital & the er docs, nurses etc have been using this to explain what is happening to her. It has made life alot easier for all.

I like that the text is large, but it disappears too soon. I will have to try something else

Excellent app. Shame about the name. This app is perfect for speaking to my deaf mother in law. An excellent addition would be the ability to edit text. I would give it 5 stars, but I have to hide the name from my mother in law as she would be very insulted by it. And rightly so. Please change the name, then I'll rate it 5 stars.

Great little app that does exactly what it says on the tin. Well done for taking the time to develope it and for getting it to pick up with such accuracy. You even thought to increase the text size for the elderly to read easy. Best app I have found for my father in law. Thank you.

title: Hear Boost: Enhanced Microphone Volume & Recording
description:
A powerful aid for your hearing. Supercharge your ear and get enhanced hearing with this microphone amplifier. Hear the world around you in an enhanced way like you may have never heard it before. Hear Boost gives your ears amplified super hearing and recording ability to easily capture far away sounds and improve your hearing. Give your ears super powers. Listen and record up to 200x what your microphone normally picks up. 

Here’s a tip to get the best sound out of the app. Start with your volume down on your device then slowly turn up the microphone gain in the app. Then you can slowly raise the volume on your device to get a clean sound. The interplay between the two is key. 

There are 2 separate in-app purchases:
1) Unlimited Listening & Recording
2) Use the 6-Band Equalizer

Be good to your ears and start with the volume down. Slowly raise the volume as your ears can take it. This app can get very loud so please be careful. The ear is very sensitive.

Super charge your ears with an aid and give them a hearing boost. A recording and hearing tool for journalists, students, parents, the curious and anyone who wants to enhance their hearing. Store and share your recordings in wav or mp3 format. 

Our microphone input and voice filter switch make this app the perfect tool for journalists to record interviews, students to record lectures, the hard of hearing to use as a hearing aid and much more.

Hear Boost can work in the background so you can place your device anywhere with its display off while it’s still listening or recording. There is no limit to recording. It will keep recording until you tap stop or your storage has run out of free space. 

We suggest using wired headphones. Without headphones connected it will feedback on itself and make a very unpleasant sound unless you record and or listen with the volume down. Bluetooth compatible. Use with any Bluetooth headset, but be aware that Bluetooth as a technology has a delay. Because of this we suggest you use Hear Boost with wired headphones.

USES FOR HEAR BOOST:
Amplify your microphone up to 200x
Record sound from far away
Record samples for use in music
Record interviews
Use as a hearing aid
Record class lectures
Improves hearing by amplifying sound
Increase the power of your ears
Hear sounds louder and clearer
Control the volume of sounds and voices 
Hear human voices louder and clearer by tapping the voice filter button
Control the volume of sounds by using our gain level and volume button
Free app to try
Unlimited recording
Unlimited recording time
Record for as long as your storage space will allow
Hear Boost super recorder
Ear Boost
Ear Aid

More Apps by Future Moments:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4907307349161033119

recentChanges: Updates and improvements
comments: I was able to record a piece using this app. It works exceptionally well with minimal delay and reasonable gain control. The recording also comes out as heard. However, there's been a problem when I'm trying to keep the recording as a file to share it. Other than the sharing, this is a pretty good app! Thank you so much for this!

Personally I quite like the app. I can live without the equalizer. But the biggest thing I noticed while using the app was that for devices using bluetooth it wouldn't pull audio from it but instead the phone itself. Presenting unnecessary sounds when held in a pocket or other spaces. If it were possible to input an option for which mic to use that would be fantastic.

It does have good hearing however i would love to be able to find a app that you can actully hear what peiple ard saying that are outside or downstairs .bug if tou in th eff same room grest for hearing .

Works very well as a broadband booster. People with hearing loss need more precision in setting gain by frequency it is rare that one gain fits all. Please consider adding capability to drag a gain/frequency curve using finger or stylus.

Very effective in boosting sounds around you. Massive amplification which is adjustable, good noise reduction, (paid, but not expensive) equalizer, and voice filter. Works in the background! Requests: selectable mic input (phone, wired or bluetooth), and clarity about paid options (unlimited use, equalizer, anything else? Make it transparent and allow an option to unlock everything at once, with a discount).

title: Hearing Aid App
description:
Hearing Aid App for android filters and amplifies sound from your surroundings using microphone and streams the amplified sound to wired or Bluetooth headset for super hearing or better hearing. Hearing Aid App for android lets you hear amplified sound using wired or bluetooth headset, earphones and earbuds for better sound feedback.

Use hearing aid app for android to boost and amplify sound from your Television, Radio, Laptop, Speaker, and more. Hearing Aid App for android restores your hearing to normal levels against hearing loss, and it could be used as temporary hearing aid when you lose your prescribed medical hearing aid device from your audiologist.

The hearing amplifier in super hearing aid app for android captures external sounds and transmits the amplified sound to your headset or earphones so you can hear better, communicate effectively, know what’s going on around you, enjoy natural sounds like birds chirping, and eliminate risk of danger.

This hearing aid app for android utilizes the power of Android and your mobile phone's capabilities to facilitate super hearing using your microphone. Connect wired or Bluetooth headset and use hearing aid app for android as an emergency hearing aid app or hearing amplifier for better hearing when you lose your medical hearing aid device or when your hearing aid fails to amplify sound.

USES OF HEARING AID APP
1. Louder, clearer, better hearing when chatting with friends and family.
2. Super hearing at an event where the speaker is far away from you.
3. Restore normal hearing levels against hearing loss or hearing difficulty.
4. Clearer sound from your television, radio, laptop while you relax, work out, etc.
5. Better hearing during meetings, conferences, workshops, and boot-camps.
6. For super-human hearing abilities!

FEATURES OF HEARING AID APP
• The hearing amplifier produces quality sound from microphone for super hearing.
• The hearing aid app supports wireless and bluetooth headsets.
• Bass Booster produces better sound output.
• Echo Cancellation by the sound amplifier eliminates any echoes in the sound output.
• Record sound using the built-in sound recorder.
• Choose Equalizer Presets and set levels for best sound feedback.
• Control volume of sound from the hearing amplifier.
• Save your Configurations and Settings.
• Automatic Gain Control prevents distortion of sound from the hearing amplifier
• Noise Suppression eliminates any background noise from the super hearing amplifier.

DISCLAIMER
• Hearing Aid App for android is not a prescribed replacement for a hearing aid. Always keep your prescribed medical hearing aid from your audiologist or ear physician. Consult your physician when experiencing hearing loss or hearing problems.

title: Super Hearing Sound Magnifier
description:
Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder is the ultimate super hearing aid and hearing amplifier that amplifies external sound using headset microphone or phone mic and streams to headset for super hearing with your ears.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder uses hearing amplifier that captures and amplifies sound and streams to your Bluetooth headset for super hearing.
 
Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder contains a built-in Sound Booster that lets you adjust and enhance the quality of sound feedback.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder helps restore normal hearing levels against hearing loss so you can hear better, communicate effectively, know what's going on around you and eliminate danger.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder supports Bluetooth Headset (Wireless headset) and Wired headsets, so you can utilize the hearing amplifier as an alternative hearing aid when you lose your prescribed medical hearing aid from your audiologist.

Use Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder to amplify sound from your Television, Radio, Speakers, environments, etc. for super hearing while you relax, work out, or do your daily tasks.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder is the latest super hearing aid and hearing amplifier designed for amplified hearing on android. Utilize its sound amplifier features to boost sound for your ears and experience better hearing.

WHY SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER RECORDER?
1. Hear better during meetings and conversations with friends and family.
2. Boost sound for super hearing during events where the speaker is far away.
3. Amplify sound from your Television, Radio, etc. for super hearing.
4. Hearing aid to restore normal hearing against hearing loss.
5. Emergency hearing aid when you lose your medical hearing aid device.
6. Experience the power of a super hearing amplifier for android.

FEATURES OF SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER 
1. Clear Sound Output
2. Bluetooth & Wired Headsets
3. Echo Cancellation
4. Noise Suppression
5. Sound Equalizer
6. Bass Booster
7. MP3 Sound Recorder
8. Automatic Gain Control
9. Graphic Virtualizer
10. Volume Controller
11. Wave Visualizer
12. Save & Load Configurations

HOW TO USE SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER 
1. Connect your wired headphones or Bluetooth headset. If using bluetooth headset, ensure Bluetooth is switched on and your hearing device is properly connected to your phone. You can play music to test its functionality.
2. Launch Super Hearing Sound Magnifier and tap "Listen" to start the hearing amplifier.
3. Place phone near source of sound for hearing amplifier to detect and amplify sound.
4. Listen to the amplified sound coming through your wired or Bluetooth headset.

Disclaimer: Use Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder to amplify sound from your surroundings for better hearing, not to replace your medical hearing aid device from your audiologist. Consult your physician if you're experiencing hearing loss or hearing difficulty.

title: Ear Agent Live: Ultimate Super Hearing Aid App
description:
Ear Agent Live is a hearing app that turn your mobile phone in to a powerful listening device. This is not a medical device, it just helps you hear better.

Although it is not a replacement but it can be used as a hearing aid if you forget to take your hearing aid with you.

This app is very simple to use. Attach your HEADPHONES or HANDS FREE to your mobile and turn on the app by clicking on big button at centre.

You can use it as hearing aid. You can also listen what ever you want by using this app. You can hear tv better. You can listen lecture more clear from back seats.

Ear Agent Live amplifies the sound from your devices microphone and put directly to your ears through headphones.

It allows you to listen the world around you better. It allows you to capture the natural sounds more clear. Also allow you to hear more feeble sounds that would have been impossible to hear without Ear Agent Live.

It is fully automatically powered app and includes an equalizer for further settings. It auto adjust according to the audio input coming through microphone.

Ear Agent Live also includes an audio visualizer that tells you about the intensity of the sound with a line graph.

Ear Agent Live is also very safe to use as it does not allow to record the audio, denying the culprits any activity.

Please try Ear Agent Live and use it to hear better!

title: Hearing Loss Sounds Like
description:
It is very extremely hard for persons with no hearing impairment to understand what a deaf or partially deaf person still can hear or understand. This app attempts to give a peek into their world. 

Load a soundtrack. Create an audiogram (a graph of the amount of hearing loss) for a hearing impaired person. List to the soundtrack normally and filtered through the audiogram.

Some examples for a quick start are provided.

description:
This app improves the communication experience of people with partial or total hearing loss problems and mute people. 

I'ts super easy to use and intuitive. 

The app has text-to-speech and speech-to-text features and includes 40+ languages.

The only thing that requires internet connection is the speech-to-text feature. 

You just have to press the play button when you want some text to be spoken, and tap the microphone when you want to start dictating. Also you can change the language whenever you want.

I hope you like it!

title: uSound for Samsung - Hearing test
description:
uSound for Samsung is a partnership between uSound and Samsung to develop a mobile application that allows you to perform an estimated hearing test and find out your risk of hearing loss for FREE.

The application is free to download and only requires a headset to perform the test. It also provides the possibility to consult with a hearing health professional.

For consultations or more information you can access www.uSoundPorSamsung.com.ar

uSound for Samsung features 

The application consists of a free, estimated hearing test that takes only a few minutes. It can be used with conventional headphones and with most of the Smartphones on the market. The sound quality is subject to the type of audio processor of each cell phone. If you have any questions regarding your device, please send us an email to support@usound.co

After performing the estimation test, the user receives the result that can be compared with a hearing health professional directly from the application itself, since we ALWAYS recommend visiting and consulting with a registered hearing health professional, either privately or from the application.

Recommendations for use:

We recommend that you perform the hearing test in a quiet place. It is likely that the first time you take the test you will hear new sounds, so in a normal process your ear will need to adapt. In some cases, we recommend that you take the test twice to verify the results.

At uSound we believe that consultation with a licensed hearing health care professional is very important, so we ALWAYS recommend contacting one of the network of professionals in the app, or privately.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us!

What is hearing loss? 

It is the partial or total hearing loss in one or both ears. 

I have my results, what do I do now ? 

Once you have your results, you can consult a professional directly from the app to check them, or to make a particular query of your interest.

For cases that demonstrate some risk of hearing loss, uSound launched a campaign so that these moments of staying at home are ones of companionship, union and connection with our loved ones. Now uSound Hearing Assistant is completely free. Find the #ListenAtHome app and reconnect with that person you love.

Learn more at www.uSound.co

Clarifications

-The uSound for Samsung application allows you to get a quick estimate of your hearing level. It does NOT replace medical audiometry.

-We work together with medical teams and licensed hearing health professionals to ensure that we provide the best quality of service and experience for you.
descriptionHTML:
uSound for Samsung is a partnership between uSound and Samsung to develop a mobile application that allows you to perform an estimated hearing test and find out your risk of hearing loss for FREE.

The application is free to download and only requires a headset to perform the test. It also provides the possibility to consult with a hearing health professional.

For consultations or more information you can access www.uSoundPorSamsung.com.ar

uSound for Samsung features

The application consists of a free, estimated hearing test that takes only a few minutes. It can be used with conventional headphones and with most of the Smartphones on the market. The sound quality is subject to the type of audio processor of each cell phone. If you have any questions regarding your device, please send us an email to support@usound.co

After performing the estimation test, the user receives the result that can be compared with a hearing health professional directly from the application itself, since we ALWAYS recommend visiting and consulting with a registered hearing health professional, either privately or from the application.

Recommendations for use:

We recommend that you perform the hearing test in a quiet place. It is likely that the first time you take the test you will hear new sounds, so in a normal process your ear will need to adapt. In some cases, we recommend that you take the test twice to verify the results.

At uSound we believe that consultation with a licensed hearing health care professional is very important, so we ALWAYS recommend contacting one of the network of professionals in the app, or privately.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us!

What is hearing loss?

It is the partial or total hearing loss in one or both ears.

I have my results, what do I do now ?

Once you have your results, you can consult a professional directly from the app to check them, or to make a particular query of your interest.

For cases that demonstrate some risk of hearing loss, uSound launched a campaign so that these moments of staying at home are ones of companionship, union and connection with our loved ones. Now uSound Hearing Assistant is completely free. Find the #ListenAtHome app and reconnect with that person you love.

Learn more at www.uSound.co

Clarifications

-The uSound for Samsung application allows you to get a quick estimate of your hearing level. It does NOT replace medical audiometry.

-We work together with medical teams and licensed hearing health professionals to ensure that we provide the best quality of service and experience for you.

title: HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier
description:
HearMax is the ultimate super hearing aid and hearing amplifier to amplify and boost sound from surroundings for better hearing or super hearing with your ears using headset, headphone, earbuds and earphones.

The hearing aid features of HearMax make it possible to amplify sound by placing your phone near sound sources such as Speaker, Television, Radio, Laptop, etc.

HearMax Super Hearing Aid & Hearing Amplifier helps with hearing loss or hearing problems so you can hear better, communicate more effectively, and eliminate danger.

The hearing amplifier utilizes the powerful audio features of android to bring you super hearing based on your phone's capabilities.

HearMax is the latest super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier designed for amplified hearing on Android. Use this sound amplifier to boost sound for your ears.

WHY HEARMAX?
1. Hear better during one-on-one conversations and meetings.
2. Ear agent for super hearing during an event where the speaker is far away from you.
3. Amplify and listen to sound from your Television, Radio, Laptop while you relax, work out, cook, or do your daily tasks from a far distance.
4. Hearing aid to restore your hearing to normal levels against hearing loss.
5. Use as hearing aid when you lose your medically prescribed hearing aid.
6. Experience the power of a super hearing ear agent app for android.

HEARMAX FEATURES:
1. High-Quality Sound Feedback
2. Sound Amplifier & Ear Agent
3. Cancellation of Acoustic Echo (AEC)
4. Equalizer & Presets
5. Bass Booster (BB)
6. Automatic Gain Control (AGC)
7. Graphic Virtualizer
8. MP3 Sound Recorder
9. Volume Controller
10. Noise Suppression
11. Wave Visualizer
12. Save your configurations and preferences
13. Regular updates with new features, bug-fixes and your suggestions.

HOW TO USE HEARMAX:
1. Plug-in and connect headset or earphones to your smartphone. If you're using a wireless headset, make sure Bluetooth is turned on and your hearing device is properly connected to your phone. You can play music to test functionality.

2. Launch HearMax super hearing aid app for android and tap "Listen" for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound into your headset!

3. Put your phone near any source of sound for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound in real-time.

4. Listen to the amplified sound using your listening device connected to this ear agent.

Disclaimer: Use HearMax super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier for android for the purpose of amplified hearing, not as a replacement for your prescribed medical hearing aid device from your audiologist. Consult your physician if you're encountering any hearing difficulty.

title: Safe Headphones - Hear Background Noises
description:
Note: Audio Recording Permission is required to Capture Background Noises.

Note: Using this as a spy app to listen to other's conversations may cause you legal trouble. This app is designed only to be used for safety purposes only.

This app will turn your Headphones into Noise Un-Cancelling Headphones which will allow you to hear background noises and Car Horns while listening to Music. Now you can use your headphones in public places without worrying about safety. This app can also be used as a hearing aid if anyone with hearing loss

This app works like Quick Ambient Mode in Galaxy Buds where you can briefly hear your surroundings without turning the music off completely.

This app also improves your hearing ability to hear audible sounds more clear and loud directly into your ears. All you have to do is to plug headphones to your device and switch on the button. You can put the device closer to the person or audio source you want to listen louder while putting headphones in your ear.

You can listen to whatever you want to listen to using this app. Even if you want to hear something from a relatively large distance like from another room you can use Bluetooth headphones or earpiece and place the device safely near the place of conversation or audio source. This app can turn your device into a powerful listening device and turn your normal ear into a miracle ear anyone wants to have.

You can use this app in a number of ways. You can listen to lectures better from back seats. You can listen to TV programs better from a distance. All this app is going to do for you is to collect the sound from the device's microphone and then pass it to the headphones after the sound amplifier in the app amplifies the sound collected from the microphone.

Key Features:

* Improves your hearing by amplifying sound from surrounding

* Can hear audible sounds loud and clear

* Can control the volume of sounds and voices with the volume control at the bottom

* Can also control the volume of playing sound with the device's volume control buttons

* Beautiful UI based on Google's Material Design UI

comments: Juat trying it out but I know having audio on blast while talking to someone and/or walking around traffic is something that irritates or endangers yourself. Having an app that keeps you connected with the world is something that might save my life and will keep me in tune with my surrounding environment. So far I'm able to listen to my music and hear someone speak to me. It picks up on things as small as my breathing and relays it through my earbuds so I can listen to my music and hear someone.

This app works amazingly well. It seriously kills all background noises completely & allows me to hear other sounds. Very impressive. Only downside which is the only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is the fact that you can NOT turn it off at all. Exiting the app won't do it, closing the app won't bit even killing the app. Literally the only way to turn it off is to uninstall it & then I have to reinstall it again when I want to use it again. Please fix this please thank you

This is good but is missing a killer feature, boost mode. If I wanted to I could use this as a hearing aid, but only with the current settings set to their absolute maximum. The option to go even higher would allow one to use this app to help with hearing in a pinch. Haven't seen an app with latency this low on the store.

I was almost disappointed that I couldn't find any app that can produce ambient sound since the one that came with my A7 doesn't work with my ear buds and boom! I found this. This is almost close to the real thing. However a boost to volumes would be nice also, add the Bluetooth microphone options and make the sound match the frequency of it's recoding. Thank you for such amazing app.

Does as advertised, lets u hear surrounding sounds while listening to music on your headphones/earpiece. There is gain control to regulate amount of background noise you hear which is nice. Only gripe is that the app uses the phone mic as opposed to the Wired/Bluetooth earpiece mic, rendering it useless if i want to be able to hear ambient sound while on the go while listening to music at the same time.

title: Hearoes
description:
Empower your hearing today!

Hearoes is an interactive auditory training platform for those with Cochlear Implants, Hearing aids and hearing loss to help familiarise different environmental sounds, and vocabulary and improve auditory feedback.  

We're collaborated with audiologist and speech pathologist at hospitals to help bring engaging interactive auditory training for hearing impaired recipients different stages of their hearing journey, to help hear new sounds and confidence today.

It combines proven assessments used in rehabilitation sessions and on-going training with gamified activities and interactions to create an aesthetically engaging and user-centric experience for recipients. Hearoes helps this critical stage of on-going training become less of a chore for those with hearing aids, cochlear implants, and hearing loss.

It features dynamic pathways covering 5 key proven modules and 30+ fun activities focused on learning a specific part in the hearing journey of new sounds. 

Some of the key modules featured in Hearoes are: 

- Environmental Sounds: Combination of daily sounds, such as in the kitchen, rural and farm, and music. Immerse yourself in different environments and hear the sounds around the theme.

Introduction to Words: Learning pitches and syllables around words.

Vowels and Consonants: Helping to be familiar with sounds of vowels and consonants in initial and final position.

Understanding Sentences: Progressive narratives in common day scenes. Ranging from video clips (for lip-reading) to audio with background noise to help learn in a comfortable notion.

We also have a feedback option built-in and would love to hear your thoughts, so we can continue to build a great product to help those with hearing loss feel comfortable in different environments.

recentChanges:
Thanks to everyone's feedback, the app is now further improved.

What's New:
- Four new activities focusing on Intro to Vowels,
- You can now download or share all your progress much more easily with others via email, messages and other supported apps,
- Introducing new result information and scores at the end of the activities.
- Resolved and fixed issue some had with Today I... activity,
- Some tweaks and optimisations internally and polished some rough edges throughout.
comments: Enjoying the app. I'm looking forward to using it more. Lots to explore and learn from! Had some problems accessing it at first but first class support soon sorted that out. All good now.

I really appreciate all the time and care and creativity that you are putting into this. I'm an adult, with long-term hearing loss. The last few years I've realized the real problem is often not just volume, but distinguishing sounds, especially nowadays when people tend to mush their words. (Ahem.) My only suggestion for now is that maybe down the road you can incorporate different forms of English; you'all are Aussies? Thank you. I look forward to seeing this evolve!

Have been using the app for about a month. But in past week or so my score history has disappeared and it is not keeping track each time I use it. So have to restart from beginning each time. Has something changed? Otherwise very useful tool.

my son just received his devices the nucleus7 last Friday. I'm trying to find a few good apps to help him I've been trying to use this app for 3 days now it refuses to load it keeps telling me I'm not connected to the internet which is completely false information. It does not work
I am having trouble with connecting my N7 mini mic to this program. i have a samsung s9 is there some setting on my phone that i am supposed to do. so frustrating.

description:
Ear Scream Live deep hearing Agent powers your ears by ampliﬁed sound put to ears.

Although it is not a replacement but it can be used as a hearing aid if you forget to take your hearing aid with you.

-listen what ever you want by using this app. 
-hear tv better. 
-listen lecture more clear from back seats.

title: MDHearing
description:
The MDHearing app offers multiple functions: a free hearing test and an app for the CORE hearing aids.  

FREE HEARING TEST 
The MDHearing hearing test is the quick, easy and free way to check your hearing at home.
• No need to go to a clinic
• Simple and easy-to-use 
• Instant results in under 8 minutes
• Designed with the help of audiologists, ENT doctors, and sound engineers to maximize accuracy
• No hearing aids required, just a pair of headphones or earbuds


CONNECT CORE HEARING AIDS
Use your smartphone or tablet to control the settings and personalize CORE hearing aids for your specific needs. Life sounds better when you're in control.
• Create a personal profile for each ear to customize programs
• Adjust the volume of your CORE hearing aids
• Select the program to suit your environment
• View hearing aid battery levels
• Update your profile as your hearing needs change over time
• Request remote assistance from an MDHearingAid specialist

recentChanges: Fix for Android 10 users experiencing difficulty pairing their aids to their devices.
comments: After the first week I have experienced zerorl problems connecting to my hearing aides, setup was easy and straightforward. I understand keeping the settings fairly simple however it would be nice for those who choose to have more "advanced" settings where have more frequency control and such. Would like to hopefully see more bluetooth features in the future. All in all a very good app and love the hearing aides.

Update 9/10/20 - App fails to find Right aid. Swap batteries between devices and both connect. Battery level indicator ALWAYS shows Pea Green [Yellow in the manual] on both devices. Replaced batteries. App never shows anything but Pea Green until app won't connect. App might show Green for a few seconds with new batteries if the app is started within a few seconds after the battery door is closed. Without both devices connected, app is useless as it will not move past the connection screen. App version claims 2.1.4 but is more like 0.0.214 Phone app is difficult to adjust levels. "Sliders" jump and give annoying "Maximum Threshold Reached" message. HI has the most effect. MID and LOW, much less. Adjustability is fair. It takes a bit of futzing with EQ, Noise Reduction and Direction to achieve results. Aids annoyingly reset to Min and Program 1 if batteries are disconnected. Level adjustment could say L1, L2, etc. rather than just beep for levels 2 plus. Programs state Program 1, Program 2. Updated after 3 go-rounds: App is usable to configure and set various program functions. Completed the test on both devices, created profile. When I open app, no profile and it wants me to start over from scratch. The inability to remember devices is a pain. Having to depower one hearing aid so it can find the other is a joke in today's connected world. Really terrible application flow. Adjusting profile after completion based on age and gender makes no sense.

Good concepts but improvements needed 1. Connection issues.. getting worst 2. Volume adjusting down randomly. 3 program is loss. Then a number appears where program icon was. What does this number mean. 4. Emailed support. Said they needed more info. If I had more info I would have sent it. 5. When all the above happens the hearing aids are telling me something. I dont know what because I cant hear. Why not have option for notifications on phone. The maybe I can give suppor more info

I use the app daily with my MDHearing Core hearing aids, both right and left ear aids, and it works great. I love being able to change the program to suit my current environment, i.e. in a restaurant. One minor glitch I have discovered is that if your profile is established for both right and left ear aids, when you are only wearing one aid or if the battery is dead in one of the aids, the app refuses to sync with the one hearing aid you are wearing.
So far no problem with the app. Sometimes a little slow connecting to the hearing aids. Very happy with these hearing aids.

title: Visual Hearing Aid
description:
Communicate fast with your friends, family or anyone who has hearing loss or are hearing impaired with Visual Hearing Aid.  Speak into your phone or tablet and the app displays your words. 

It can get frustrating if you don’t read sign language or someone’s hearing aid isn’t working, but using this app you can get back to communicating and dealing with more important issues.

Super easy to use!

• Select green button to start the app listening
• Button turns red when it’s ready to transcribe your words
• Speak clearly into the device
• Point the screen at the person you’re communicating with

You can also:

• Forward conversations to email or other shareable platforms
• Delete information when you’re done


Quick options to make things easier to read:

• Change color of text
• Change size of text


Other great reasons to use Visual Hearing Aid:

• Do you work in a noisy location with loud music and can’t hear what customers are asking for? Setup Visual Hearing Aid, add on a microphone, and stop wondering if you got the order right. The only limitation is the quality of the microphone. 

• Work in emergency services and you’re trying to help someone who can’t hear you? Use the app to get the information you need, right away.

• Know someone with sensorineural hearing loss? This can create a permanent hearing loss. But open up the lines of communication with Visual Hearing Aid. 


The first hour is free.
