title: Super Ear Tool: Aid in Super Clear Audible Hearing
description:
Super Ear Tool is an app that improves your hearing ability to hear audible sounds more clear and loud directly into your ears. All you have to do is to plug headphones to your device and click the button with ear symbol. You can put the device closer to the person or audio source you want to listen louder while putting headphones in your ear. This app turns you from a normal person to give you feelings of a super hero!

You can listen whatever you want to listen using this app. Even if you want to hear something from relatively large distance like from another room you can use BLUETOOTH headphones or earpiece and place the device safely near the place of conversation or audio source. This app can turn your device into a powerful listening device and turn your normal ear into a miracle ear anyone want to have.

You can use this app in a number of ways. You can listen to lectures better from back seats. You can listen to TV programs better from a distance. All this app is going to do for you is to collect the sound from the device's microphone and then pass it to the headphones after the sound amplifier in the app amplifies the sound collected from microphone. It helps to hear better, clear, louder.

Super Ear Tool can be used as hearing aid if anyone with hearing loss or hearing impairment do not have approach to their listening device but do not forget that this is not a replacement for hearing aid. But people can use it as a hearing aid if they really want to.


Application's Key Features:

✓ Improves your hearing by amplifying sound from surrounding

✓ Can hear audible sounds loud and clear

✓ Can control the volume of sounds and voices with the volume control at bottom

✓ Can also control volume of playing sound with the device's volume control buttons

✓ Contains a visualizer that shows you the intensity of the sound in the form of distortion of a graph line

✓ Free and offline app

✓ Ads are non intrusive


Super Ear Tool is not intended to be used for spying or eavesdropping. Do not confuse it as a spy app and do not spy on others or hear someone's private conversation using this app. You are supposed to just hear better by using this app. Additionally this app does not allow to save the recording for preventing its illegal use. All you have to do is to use it responsibly and hear the world better!

If you like this app, please RATE, SHARE, and leave a good REVIEW. And if you don't then be honest please. Also tell me your suggestions and more exciting features to add in the next version update.

comments: I tried to use it as an inear tool since I'm a singer. It modifies my voice resulting in not the pitch I sing and it works like echo. I immediately uninstalled it. Horrible and disappointing

It works now, but Make sure you get your earbuds out before you turn it off. My ears are still ringing from the max volume ad that came on when I turned the listen function off. The ad should either fade up to give you time to adjust the volume or the volume should go back to whatever it was before you activated the listening function. I did buy the no ads upgrade after that experience. But seriously this did cause a little hearing damage and might badly startle someone who is driving...

I am hard of hearing in one ear and thought this might assist so I bought the full app. However, there is a time lag between the spoken word, which I can hear in my good ear and the amlified word through the app. So it is not suitable for my purpose. The app description should state this deficiency.

I thought it was gonna be a great app until I really wanted to listen to something. It only amps the noise within arm's reach. I was thinking it outta be able to track thirty feet. Maybe I can give better score next time

Downloaded 5 similar apps, only this one is simple, reliable and clear, the rest either volume too low, delayed or echoing. Only problem is when the phone was rotated the app stops immediately. If without this issue, this is a 5 star app! Screen turns off the app still works, this is great. My 108 years old grandpa needs this with a Bluetooth headphones to have a normal conversation with us, loved this more than his hearing aids. Older people can use their phone with a Bluetooth headphones now!

title: CYHT Hearing Test. Can You Hear These. Simple Fast
description:
Hearing Test as Easy as 1, 2, 3.
Test How Old Your Ears Are 
CYHT is Simple Ears Tester App. 
Are Your Ears in Fit Condition?

When listening to a personal music system with earphones at a maximum volume, the sound generated can reach a level of over 100 dBA, loud enough to begin causing permanent damage after just 15 minutes per day!

Noise-Induced Hearing Loss
What is noise-induced hearing loss (NIHL) ?
Every day, we experience sound in our environment, such as the sounds from television and radio, household appliances, and traffic. Normally, these sounds are at safe levels that don’t damage our hearing. But sounds can be harmful when they are too loud, even for a brief time, or when they are both loud and long-lasting. These sounds can damage sensitive structures in the inner ear and cause noise-induced hearing loss (NIHL).

NIHL can be immediate or it can take a long time to be noticeable. It can be temporary or permanent, and it can affect one ear or both ears. Even if you can’t tell that you are damaging your hearing, you could have trouble hearing in the future, such as not being able to understand other people when they talk, especially on the phone or in a noisy room. Regardless of how it might affect you, one thing is certain: noise-induced hearing loss is something you can prevent.

Who is affected by NIHL?

Exposure to harmful noise can happen at any age. People of all ages, including children, teens, young adults, and older people, can develop NIHL. Approximately 15 percent of Americans between the ages of 20 and 69—or 26 million Americans—have hearing loss that may have been caused by exposure to noise at work or in leisure activities. As many as 16 percent of teens (ages 12 to 19) have reported some hearing loss that could have been caused by loud noise, according to a 2010 report based on a survey from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

title: Hearing Training
description:
Hearing training is a game learning app that improves your hearing by letting you enjoy the game as you earn a high score with correct answers.

The goal is to hear the correct word as often as possible.

This game was created specifically for hearing impaired individuals who recently received a cochlear implant or recently were fitted with hearing aids. The app will enunciate English words and you must select the correct word that you heard.

A hearing person may also use this app for their own entertainment.

title: hlCorr: Слуховой аппарат - корректор / Hearing aid
description:
Приложение hlCorr (Hearing Loss Corrector) – бесплатное программное обеспечение, использующее современные методы обработки звука для компенсации слуховых потерь пользователя, от лёгкой степени, до тяжёлой.

	Описание:
Приложение, в режиме реального времени получает сигнал от микрофона, модифицирует его в соответствии с персональными настройками и воспроизводит изменённый сигнал через проводные наушники или гарнитуру (наушники с микрофоном), компенсируя этим слуховые потери пользователя.

Коррекция звука происходит в два этапа:
•	на первом этапе происходит динамическая компрессия звукового сигнала  (динамическое усиление или подавление уровня сигнала в соответствии с текущей акустической обстановкой);
•	на втором этапе применяется индивидуальный раздельный для правого и левого уха корректирующий фильтр, построенный на основании данных аудиограммы пользователя.

Для улучшения качества звука, в приложении реализован автоматический контроль коэффициента усиления и контроль наличия акустической обратной связи в звуковом тракте.

Минимально возможная временная задержка между входным и выходным звуковым сигналом обеспечивается тем, что вычислительное ядро приложения разработано на низкоуровневых языках программирования с применением оптимизированных алгоритмов обработки и передачи данных.

	Особенности:
Язык интерфейса приложения: русский и английский, устанавливается автоматически, в зависимости от настроек системы.

Рабочий режим приложения возможен только при подключении к Android - устройству проводной гарнитуры или наушников.

Все персональные настройки пользователя сохраняются в локальных профилях устройства.

Профиль представляет собой структуру данных, в которой определены настройки усилителя, заданы аудиограммы для левого и правого уха, тип корректирующего фильтра и дополнительные возможности по управлению качеством звука.

Приложение даёт возможность получить советы по его использованию, отследить соотношение спектров сигналов, отправить приватное сообщение разработчику.

	Преимущества:
Приложение может выполняться как в активном, так и в фоновом режиме.

При работе в фоновом режиме, приложение не производит лишних вычислений, поэтому его энергопотребление в этом случае минимизировано.

Переключение между профилями, например, при смене акустической обстановки, может производиться пользователем без останова рабочего режима.

Дополнительно имеется возможность автоматического запуска рабочего режима, сразу при присоединении наушников или гарнитуры.

Корректор звука предоставляет возможность управления соотношением «задержка/качество» посредством выбора количества точек БПФ.

Аудиограмма пользователя может быть создана в приложении путём тестирования слуха, так и записана на основании специализированных диагностических данных имеющихся у пользователя.

Панель настройки аудиограммы соответствует виду диагностической карты, принятому в сурдологии РФ.

Настройка параметров компрессии звука для его соответствия текущей акустической обстановке возможна в рабочем режиме. При этом процесс настройки будет визуальным.

При подключении проводного устройства, приложение автоматически определит его тип.

При использовании проводной гарнитуры, дополнительно появятся следующие возможности:
•	выбор источника звука: микрофон устройства или гарнитуры;
•	управление режимом работы: включение и выключение рабочего режима.

hlCorr имеет минимальный размер для скачивания и развертывания среди подобных приложений.

	Предупреждения:
Корректор слуха не является полноценной заменой слухового аппарата!

Корректор слуха не является медицинским программным обеспечением и не имеет соответствующей сертификации!

Оценка степени потери слуха в данном приложении является ориентировочной и не заменяет полноценной диагностики у специалиста!

Ответственность за использование данного приложения целиком и полностью несёт пользователь!

Разработчик предоставляет программное обеспечение в доступной для скачивания версии.

title: hearWHO
description:
All people should check their hearing from time to time, especially those who are at a higher risk of hearing loss such as adults above 50 years, those working in noisy places, those listening to music at high volumes for long periods of time and those experiencing ear problems.

Services for early identification and intervention should be made available through the health system.


| Want to connect with hearWHO? |

Check out our website: https://www.who.int
Like and Follow us on Facebook: https://web.facebook.com/WHO/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WHO




| Limitations |

The accuracy of your test results will depend on the type of headphones you use, as well as the ambient noise level. The results we provide are intended as a first step in testing your hearing. Please always seek advice from a medical professional. 

| Disclaimer | 

1.       If your result from using hearWHO was not favourable, we strongly recommend you  obtain a complete hearing evaluation by a certified service provider / medical professional to determine your exact hearing status.
2.       Even if your results are in the positive range but you have concerns about your hearing, we encourage you to seek a complete hearing evaluation performed by a certified service provider / medical professional.
3.       Whilst the test has a reasonable degree of accuracy, it is only intended as a screening test, with a small proportion of cases that may be incorrectly classified.
4.       The WHO and hearX Group will not be held responsible or liable for any results that are incorrect or for your use of the application.
5.       hearWHO is only intended for use by persons 16 years of age and above. The test is not intended to be used for children and will not provide reliable results in such cases.
6.       A visit to a certified service provider can assist in differentiating between different types of hearing problems.
7.       Hearing loss may be caused by obstruction of the outer ear canal from wax, fluid or changes in the structure or function of the middle ear system, and changes in function of the nervous system.
8.       Some of these hearing problems can be treated whilst others may be permanent and may need assistive devices.
9.   	It is important to consult with a certified service provider early; all forms of hearing loss may become more serious is they are left unaddressed.

recentChanges: Bug Fix
comments: Absolutely amazing..I'm scoring avg 82+ overall. But, elderly people or people with hearing problem would struggle to get 50+ It's a scientific approach to test your hearing. Thank you #WHO from 🇮🇳

A good idea with plenty of limits that could be explained better. When one reviewer asked if the app can measure one ear at a time, the developer said it "presents out-of-phase digits and picks up unilateral and conductive losses along with bilateral sensorineural losses". I doubt most people would understand what you are saying, no matter how well they can hear. Please speak plainly. To calibrate the volume, how about encouraging users to lower the volume until one (differentiated) digit is no longer audible? Otherwise I could use a volume ranging from 50% to 100% and get vastly different results. Lastly, the app refers erratically to trained people and to professionals but doesn't define them. I recommend putting something in the FAQs about audiologists, Otolaryngologists etc., and how to find or identify a qualified expert (and avoid charlatans).
Good ?!!! I only can hear in one ear and I scored about 43 with more than a one testing . Does it mean the other ear is damaged ?! I wish there is an option for testing only one ear .

Don't waste your time! This is surprisingly terrible all it does output pink noise and the tones don't work with any headset! You'd think that it should work for all headsets and not just select ones. BTW trying to guess tones by there pitch is not a hearing test. A hearing test is based on amplitude of a pitch not how well you can recognise its frequency.  In response to the reply. First things first the message about stereo headsets is ridiculous all headsets are stereo name me one headset that is not! I'm a sound engineer and programmer the issue is not the headsets, btw I have tried about 20 pairs lying around the studio here, it is the programming of the app. What the message should say is a stereo enabled device is required, not headsets!

- I would give more stars if It could evaluate separately right and left ears. - And because there is an option to chose your language but even though the speach is in English. So it's not understandable what you have to chose your language for? - Also, as you have to remember three digit sequence, the concentration or memory problems eventually could affect the results. - And, finally, I found an App "Check your hearing" which has many interesting features. - Thanks.

title: The official hear.com app
description:
The official hear.com app is an easy, convenient tool that puts expert advice on hearing aids at your fingertips - supporting you on your journey to better hearing every step of the way.

EXPERIENCE OUTSTANDING HEARING CARE:
• Message your personal hearing aid Consultant any time
• Receive expert advice on hearing aids
• Have your Consultant take care of finance & insurance processing
• Take part in our referral program to receive $250

APPOINTMENTS AND PROFILES:
• Easily manage or reschedule your appointments
• Always have access to your Partner Provider and Consultant’s contact information
• Get directions to your Partner Provider’s location
• Receive appointment reminders

STAY INFORMED:
• Gain access to our 'Expert Advice' to learn all about hearing loss and hearing aids 
• Discover helpful tips on how to make the most of your hearing aids
• Watch videos on the latest hearing aid technology 
• Understand what's next on your journey to better hearing

hear.com is the global leader in the hearing aid industry. Made up of hearing aid experts and experienced audiologists, hear.com guides you every step of the way on your journey to better hearing. title: Kids Hearing Game
description: It's difficult to detect hearing loss in children. Temporary hearing loss is common and can result in poor school performance and behavior problems. title: Ear Agent: Deep for Super Hearing
description:
Ear Agent deep for Super Hearing is a hearing app that turn your mobile phone in to a powerful listening device. This is not a medical device, it just helps you hear better.

Although it is not a replacement but it can be used as a hearing aid if you forget to take your hearing aid with you.

This app is very simple to use. Attach your HEADPHONES or HANDS FREE to your mobile and turn on the app by clicking on big button at centre.

You can use it as hearing aid. You can also listen what ever you want by using this app. You can hear tv better. You can listen lecture more clear from back seats.

Ear Agent deep for Super Hearing amplifies the sound from your devices microphone and put directly to your ears through headphones.

It allows you to listen the world around you better. It allows you to capture the natural sounds more clear. Also allow you to hear more feeble sounds that would have been impossible to hear without Ear Agent deep for Super Hearing.

It is fully automatically powered app and includes an equalizer for further settings. It auto adjust according to the audio input coming through microphone.

Ear Agent deep for Super Hearing also includes an audio visualizer that tells you about the intensity of the sound with a line graph.

Ear Agent deep for Super Hearing is also very safe to use as it does not allow to record the audio, denying the culprits any activity.

Please try Ear Agent deep for Super Hearing and use it to hear better!

descriptionHTML:
Hearing loss or hearing impairment can be temporary or permanent. This apps talks about

-The factors that caused hearing loss

- Three category of healing loss

-Main types of hearing loss.

-How to prevent hearing loss.

-How to do a hearing loss self-test.

-What are the symptoms of hearing loss.

-Recommended supplements for hearing loss.

-Recommended herbs for hearing loss.

-Do's and dont's of hearing loss
summary: Hearing loss or hearing impairment is a partial or totally no hearing.

title: EarShot— Hearing Aid
description:
EarShot is a Hearing Aid Based on Smartphone and Bluetooth/Headset. EarShot is an application that provides a means of hearing assistance for hearing impaired people.

This product provides the users with the same experience as provided by the conventional hearing devices. 
Easily Accessible and Inexpensive solution for everyone.

Features : 
- Hearing test for users
- Real time adjustable sound amplification 
- Multiple profiles for different environments
- Provides sampling rate of 44.1 kHz
- User configurations are synced with cloud storage

*Disclaimer: 
The EarShot app is not approved as a medical device or software and cannot be used as a hearing aid with doctor`s prescription. 
Audiometric test provided in the application can be used only for app adjustment. Testing results are not a substitute for professional audiology tests and cannot be considered as a basis for diagnosis.

Doesn't work with latest Android update. It will amplify but hearing test and profiles don't work.

works good, I'm actually surprised that it doesn't actually work and not just say that it does work. only thing I could suggest is maybe an equaliser to help some sounds not be so loud and other sounds be a little more clear. but other wise it works good and I do recommend trying it. It's surprising all the stuff you hear.

I couldn't get it to work. The program says it is going to give me an opportunity to set the volume of 12 frequencies. I set the first frequency and couldn't get it to move to the next one. It would bring up an ad, and that was that.
Thank you so much for this app. My hearing aid broke and I had an important meeting i needed to hear and this app helped me be able to do that!

title: Hear Coach
description:
Individuals with hearing loss tend to have increased difficulty understanding speech in noise and as a result experience communication breakdowns. Tasks like the ones in this game have been shown to help improve listening ability in noise. When people have improved listening in noise they don't have to work as hard to hear and can relax and participate in conversations without straining, even in loud or busy environments. 

Hear Coach is a suite of listening games developed by Starkey Laboratories; it features games that challenge both your cognitive and auditory sharpness. 

Hear Coach allows you to track your progress over time and unlock more difficult levels as your performance improves. A different background noise stimulus within each of the levels provides you with varying degrees of difficulty to help you train your auditory system in different environments. This app is designed to help people who think they might have a hearing loss, people who have new hearing aids, and even experienced hearing aid users who want to get the most out of their listening. 

Continue to check back for added levels, new games, tips and other exciting additions.

They should add an option that allows to replay what was said. They should also show a the answer after the user gets it wrong 3 times in a row for each individual question.

title: GENIUScontrol
description:
Compatible with GENIUS and GENIUS 2.0 Miracle-Ear hearing aids; ME5400/5300, ME4400/4300, ME3400/3300 and ME2400.  The app will provide you all of the functions if configured by your Hearing Care Specialist.   

Please thoroughly read the manual of your hearing aids before using this app.

Change listening programs: With intuitive buttons, it is simple to change your listening programs. 

Volume Control: You can increase and decrease the volume of your hearing aids with a simple touch on the screen, as with the discretion of texting.

Mute: You can quickly mute your hearing aids with one touch of the app screen.

Battery Status: Check the battery status of your GENIUS 2.0 hearing instruments. 

Bass & Treble: Adjust the TrebleControl to fine tune the sound quality of your hearing aids.

Speech Navigator:  Adjust the span and direction of the microphones on GENIUS and GENIUS 2.0 technology only (ME5400/5300, ME4400/4300, ME2400). 

Tinnitus Control:  Easily adjust the volume on your tinnitus program if set by your Hearing Care Specialist. 

Display: The screen of your iOS device becomes a visual display for controlling your hearing aids. 

Intended use: The GENIUScontrol App is intended to control Miracle-Ear hearing instruments by a patient within parameters set by the Hearing Care Specialist.

Device compatibility: GENIUScontrol App is compatible with any Android device running Android 2.3 or higher. We recommend using a Smartphone device rather than a tablet device for preferred user interaction. 

Hearing aid compatibility:  The app is only compatible with the latest generation of Miracle-Ear Hearing Aids; ME5400/5300 (ME-1), ME4400/4300 (ME-2), ME3400/3300 (ME-3) and ME2275/ME2400 (ME-4). 

Control signals: This app generates short ultra-high frequency control signals which are designed to be played through the devices speakers and may be audible. 

To ensure correct operation and for safety reasons: 
1. While using the app do not hold the loudspeaker of this device to your ears or the ears of others. 
2. While using the app do not use the device with headphones, headsets or other audio playback devices.

Start controlling your smart hearing aids now- they’re GENIUS!

comments: Works okay except the directional control doesn't stay set and reverts to omni directional after about 3 to 5 minutes after you set it, and I can't tell much or any difference between prom 1 and 2 although 3 works very well for watching TV. I use prom 1 most of the time at a mid volume setting and while not great it's much better than the Belltone Aids I had previously for speech clarification.

You have to go to Miracle Ear to have them add different listening environments. The app has limited functionality. Blue tooth for streaming works only with Apple devices. There is lots of new competition for hearing aids with deregulation occuring. As with everything technical people will move towards a self service model, with better pricing.
The options are there then you can't find them again. It has difficulty reading the setup code. No instructions on how to work the bloody thing. It's hit or miss.
Works great, but needs better volume control on the tv setting without going back to the office. Would like a test feature to make sure they're working properly.
Right now having problems with volume and on my channel 3 sometimes it works sometimes it don't so I will be making an appointment to get back in in see if it's the app or if it's my hearing aids

title: Beltone HearMax
description:
﻿The Beltone HearMax™ app is compatible with the following hearing aids: 
•	Beltone Imagine™
•	Beltone Amaze™
•	Beltone Trust™ 
•	Beltone Boost Max™ 
•	Beltone Boost Ultra™


The Beltone HearMax app lets you control your hearing aids directly from your mobile device. You can change programs, and make simple or more advanced sound adjustments and save them as favorites. The app helps you learn what you can do and how to do it. It can even help you find your hearing aids if you lose them. Last, but not least, you can have your hearing care professional update your hearing aid programs and send you new hearing aid software without taking a trip to the clinic.


Notes: Please contact your local Beltone representative for product and feature availability in your market. We recommend that the hearing aids run the latest software version. If in doubt, please contact your hearing care professional.


Beltone HearMax mobile device compatibility:
Please consult the Beltone app website for up-to-date compatibility information: www.beltone.com/compatibility


Use the Beltone HearMax app to: 
•	Connect your Beltone Amaze hearing aids to compatible Android devices for direct audio streaming
•	Enjoy Beltone Remote Care: Request help with your hearing aid settings from your hearing care professional and receive new settings and software updates. 


And use these direct control and personalization options:
•	Adjust volume settings on your hearing aids
•	Mute your hearing aids
•	Adjust volume of your Beltone streaming accessories
•	Adjust speech focus as well as noise and wind-noise levels with Sound Enhancer (feature availability depends on your hearing aid model and the fitting by your hearing care professional) 
•	Change manual and streamer programs
•	Edit and personalize program names 
•	Adjust treble, middle and bass tones to your preferences
•	Save your preferred settings as a Favorite – you can even tag to a location
•	Monitor the battery status of your rechargeable hearing aids
•	Help locate lost or misplaced hearing aids
•	Tinnitus manager: Adjust sound variation and frequency of the Tinnitus Breaker Pro. Select Nature Sounds (feature availability depends on your hearing aid model and the fitting by your hearing care professional)


For more information please visit www.beltone.com/hearmax or the support site www.beltone.com/support/apps-support/hearmax-app-support

When we tried to connect to the app, we kept getting the message aids were in compatible with app. It also said it would direct us back to Google so we could download the corresponding for his aids and it never did. Just kept trying to connect. People spend lots for your aids, come on Beltone at least help us out with decent apps.
I was connected for a couple of days now I cannotget past the demo stage. This app is garbage
I get to the you're installed and it freezes my phone . Stupid app

If you need to use HearMax I recommend that you do NOT get an Android 10 phone (or one that is likely to be upgraded to 10.) The Direct Audio Streaming feature is awful and there is no way to turn if off except to turn off your phone's Bluetooth or uninstall HearMax. If I want to stream music to a Bluetooth speaker or to use Android Auto, for example, it interferes; it basically hijacks the Bluetooth for its own use. The sound quality of DAS on HearMax is horrible.
Same issue as everyone else. It does not pair up with android devices since the last update (tried on Samsung, Huawei and LG). It worked fine on the previous update...please restore that version

title: Beltone Tinnitus Calmer
description:
The Beltone Tinnitus Calmer™ app uses a combination of sounds and relaxing exercises that aim to distract your brain from focusing on tinnitus.  Over time the brain learns to focus less on the tinnitus. 

The app lets you manage your personal library of sound therapy files and allows you to create your own soundscapes from environmental sounds and small pieces of music. It will also track your usage, so you can see which sounds work best for you, and it contains some secondary stimuli like colors and exercises to help keep your mind occupied. 

Just download it and listen to it as you normally listen to music from your smart phone. If you wear Beltone® wireless hearing aids, you can stream directly through them; the sound you stream will be adjusted to compensate for your hearing loss.

The app is a tool for anyone who has tinnitus. It should be used in combination with a tinnitus management programme or plan set up by a hearing care professional.

recentChanges: Japanese localization
comments: Thank you very much for your app! I have started to hear this awful sound (tinnitus) recently. It is very annoying. But your app helps me to forget about it!  However, the tool "My plan" does not work for me. What actions should I take to fix this?

Violet noise at night from my android phone saved my sanity during a months-long bout of tinnitus while my inner ear nerves repaired themselves from an ear infection. I also was impressed with the range and combinations of available sounds. Highly recommend this app!

Excellent! This is brilliant and the best tinnitus masking app I've encountered.it lets you customise what sounds, how loud they are etc. Really great. I've found it hard to sleep since my girlfriend left me but this has really helped. Thank you.
Love it! It is so helpful in masking my tinnitus st times when it is really bothering me. I like that I can create my own sound combinations that work best for ME.

Could be a great app with the ability to create your own sounds and relaxations. But, it loses one star for the timer function not working-I have missed my work alarm a few times because of this, luckily my partner has been there to wake me. And it loses another star as it shuts down when your phone goes to sleep, so I have to change my phone's settings each night to never switch off and keep it on charge. I will keep the app, but I am on the look out for another unless Beltone can sort it out.

title: Hearing Loss
description: As an audiologist I meet many people with hearing loss. In this simple game of "guessing the words" I want to give a rough picture of how some people experience their hearing loss in both quiet and noisy backgound. Enjoy!
descriptionHTML: As an audiologist I meet many people with hearing loss. In this simple game of "guessing the words" I want to give a rough picture of how some people experience their hearing loss in both quiet and noisy backgound. Enjoy!

I loved the little drawings and the sound effects. Very informative and fun to play! :)
So neat. I really like the intro
wow that was fun, lk,,mķ

title: Best Hearing Aid - Easy Listener
description:
Some people have hearing range problem in their ears so they cannot hear the sound clearly. For this purpose they buy ear tool to improve hearing or hearing protector to reduce hazardous noise. so we present a best solution for this problem.
Best Hearing Aid is a hearing aid app designed for hearing impaired people. Connect your Bluetooth or headset with your android phone. You feel that your device acts as a listening device and help you to improve your hearing problem. Even if the audible source is at large distance, person can hear the voice better and loudly.

There are numerous ways to use Best Hearing Aid app. You can use it during a lecture so in this way you can listen to the lectures more easily. You can place it near tv so listen to the Tv program more clearly. There are numerous listening aid apps in the market but Best Hearing Aid is unique by its quality. This app can get the sound from audible source and then hearing amplifier in app amplifies the sound so the user can hear the voice more clear and you can consider your self as an Easy Listener. This app will improve your active listening ability.

Best Hearing Aid has the following features:
An easy-to-use and simple user interface.
Improves your listening by Reduce noise 
Your smartphone act as a mic
 Connect via Bluetooth headsets or Earphone.
Control the volume of sounds with the volume controller.
The app is totally free and offline.
Quick response time.

For  hearing aid , you need Bluetooth headset/device or Earphone to get maximum results of our amplification in app. so get ready to become Easy Listener and get maximum benefits for our hearing aid service. Just enjoy the live listen session carefully	


Best Hearing Aid help the people who do not access to the listening device but keep in mind this app is not alternate of hearing aid. It is not approved medically as it only improves hearing ability so you feel that you are Easy Listener.While using this app, you agree that you are going to use this hearing app at your own risk. 
 
 Important Notice 
Following permission is granted in this app
Microphone Permission uses the microphone of the device to get the sound for betterment. We respect the user's privacy so this app does not store any personal data about the user. 
If you like our app then Rate, Share and give honest Review or Feedback because your opinion matters us a lot.

title: Chatable - Focus your Hearing, Remove Distraction
description:
Chatable is the easy way to focus on speech. If you have ADHD, ADD, Autism, Dyslexia or Hearing loss, then this app is perfect for you. Try free now. 

Chatable improves attention by helping you focus on speech.  Our A.I. removes background noise and improves your concentration for one to one conversation.  Try for free today.  

“Chatable will be majorly life changing for many people.” - European Audiologist of the Year 2019, Paula Cooke
 
Chatable uses headphones to turn your smartphone into a listening device that will boost volume of speech and remove distracting or overwhelming background noise. The result is, easier listening, more productive conversations, improved focus, lower stress levels and more enjoyable TV listening

Who is Chatable For? 

Chatable may help a diverse range of hearing, neurodevelopmental and processing disorders. 

Used with a listening device, Chatable can help with: 
- Processing and learning disorders such as ADHD, APD and Dyslexia
- Communication and behaviour disorders affected by listening and concentration such as Autism (Autism Spectrum Disorder) and Aspergers 
- Mild, moderate, severe, profound hearing loss
- Temporary relief from Tinnitus or background noise
 
For neurodevelopmental and processing disorders, we recommend you use noise cancelling headphones with the app for optimal experience. 

What is Chatable for? 

- Hearing one to one conversation 
- Coping in noisy and overwhelming environments 
- Improve attention and focus in the classroom / lecture 
- Use Chatable as a remote microphone or listening device
- Listening to the television or the radio, as a voice sound amplifier or listening device
- Hearing someone through facemasks 
- Listening better at work meetings
- Enhancing your hearing aid or cochlear implant  
- A backup hearing aid
 
Chatable is easy to set up and use, with no hearing test, doctor appointment, or audiologist calibration needed. Simply connect to your wired headphones, or existing hearing aid or listening device. 
 
What can you expect from Chatable? 
- Enhances focus on conversation 
- Removes stressful noise, relax easier and relieve Tinnitus
- Reduces listening effort 
- Improves speech processing 
- Less reliance on lipreading 
- Ability to listen from a distance 
- Listen to the TV at lower volume 
- Reduced usage of captions for the TV
 
You can see all our testimonials here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJMyHV-vL5zefAu7I0x0RDA/videos

How does it work?


Dr. Andy Simpson, pioneer in auditory neuroscience and AI, designed and engineered VOXimity™, our proprietary technology, to help people focus on conversation and reduce the volume of background noise. 

If you want to learn more about the invention of VOXimity™, check out the Chatable blog: https://blog.chatableapps.com/index.php/2020/01/02/the-invention-of-chatableapps

Chatable is free to install and use. Enjoy 100 minutes of free use every month, and subscribe for unlimited access.

Chatable is not a hearing aid. This is an app that uses the mobile platform for recording audio and replaying audio with or without amplification, or other similar functionalities and that uses the mobile platform to translate unintelligible speech for better clarity.

- Processing and learning disorders such as ADHD, APD and Dyslexia
- Communication and behaviour disorders affected by listening and concentration such as Autism (Autism Spectrum Disorder) and Aspergers
- Mild, moderate, severe, profound hearing loss
- Temporary relief from Tinnitus or background noise

For neurodevelopmental and processing disorders, we recommend you use noise cancelling headphones with the app for optimal experience.

What is Chatable for?

- Hearing one to one conversation
- Coping in noisy and overwhelming environments
- Improve attention and focus in the classroom / lecture
- Use Chatable as a remote microphone or listening device
- Listening to the television or the radio, as a voice sound amplifier or listening device
- Hearing someone through facemasks
- Listening better at work meetings
- Enhancing your hearing aid or cochlear implant
- A backup hearing aid

Chatable is easy to set up and use, with no hearing test, doctor appointment, or audiologist calibration needed. Simply connect to your wired headphones, or existing hearing aid or listening device.

What can you expect from Chatable?
- Enhances focus on conversation
- Removes stressful noise, relax easier and relieve Tinnitus
- Reduces listening effort
- Improves speech processing
- Less reliance on lipreading
- Ability to listen from a distance
- Listen to the TV at lower volume
- Reduced usage of captions for the TV

You can see all our testimonials here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJMyHV-vL5zefAu7I0x0RDA/videos

How does it work?


Dr. Andy Simpson, pioneer in auditory neuroscience and AI, designed and engineered VOXimity™, our proprietary technology, to help people focus on conversation and reduce the volume of background noise.

If you want to learn more about the invention of VOXimity™, check out the Chatable blog: https://blog.chatableapps.com/index.php/2020/01/02/the-invention-of-chatableapps

Chatable is free to install and use. Enjoy 100 minutes of free use every month, and subscribe for unlimited access.

Chatable is not a hearing aid. This is an app that uses the mobile platform for recording audio and replaying audio with or without amplification, or other similar functionalities and that uses the mobile platform to translate unintelligible speech for better clarity.
summary: Removes noise and improves attention for ADHD, Autism & Hearing Impaired

title: TruLink Hearing Control
description:
With TruLink Hearing Control, people with hearing loss can go anywhere and do everything more conveniently than ever before. That’s because TruLink seamlessly connects your hearing aids to your Android phone — so you can easily adjust volume, memories, and even customize the performance to unique situations. 

TruLink works with specific hearing aids from Starkey, Audibel, NuEar, MicroTech and AGX Hearing. These hearing aids must be purchased from a hearing care professional. Please go to trulinkhearing.com to locate a professional near you.

Main Features:
• Lets you control your hearing aid volume and memories via your phone 
• Lets you personalize and geo-tag memories to match what you do and where you go
• Can change memories automatically based on personalized geo-tags (e.g. changes to Coffee Shop memory when you walk into a Coffee Shop)
• Adapts automatically when you travel in a car
• Find a lost or misplaced hearing aid

*Currently supported on: 
- Samsung Galaxy® S9 running Android OS 8.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S8 running Android OS 7.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S7 running Android OS 6.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S6 running Android OS 5.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S4 or S5 running Android OS 4.4.4
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 8 running Android OS 7.0
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 7 running Android OS 6.0
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 5 running Android OS 5.1.1
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 3 or Note 4 running Android OS 5.0
- HTC M10 running Android OS 6.0
- HTC M7 & M8 running Android OS 5.0
- Pixel 2 & Pixel 2 XL running Android OS 8.0
- Pixel & Pixel XL running Android OS 7.0
- Nexus 5x & 6p running Android OS 6.0

TruLink for Android does not provide streaming at this time.

title: Earfy: live captions for persons with hearing loss
description:
Persons with hearing loss communicate independently with the Earfy app for Android! The app converts speech to text in real time, so you can immediately read what’s being said. Captions appear continuously on screen; just like subtitles on television.

The app includes useful features such as:
- 40+ languages.
- Ongoing stream of captions; no need to continuously push a button.
- Optimized readability (colors, fonts, …).
- Mirrored text. Reader & speaker can both follow.
- Correction-button to mark wrongly captioned sentences.
- Speech quality indicator.
- Copy or email transcripts of conversations.

title: Hearing Phone
description:
Inspired by my son (who has moderate hearing loss in both ears), Hearing Phone gives you hearing assistance wherever your phone goes. You can customize that assistance to fit your hearing needs, your phone, and your headphones. You can then connect to another Android device to hear them directly--just like an FM system!

Fair warning: this is not meant to replace hearing aids or to be a substitute for an evaluation by an audiologist.

title: Ear Spy Pro,Non spy Live deep hearing
description:
Ear Spy Pro,Non spy Live deep hearing

Ear Agent Live is a non spying hearing app that turn your mobile phone in to a powerful listening device. This is not a medical device, it just helps you hear better.

Although it is not a replacement but it can be used as a hearing aid if you forget to take your hearing aid with you.

This app is very simple to use. Attach your HEADPHONES or HANDS FREE to your mobile and turn on the app by clicking on big button at centre.

This app is not for your ears to spy. Rather you can listen what ever you want by using this app. You can hear tv better. You can listen lecture more clear from back seats.

Ear Agent Live also includes an audio visualizer that tells you about the intensity of the sound with a line graph.

Ear Agent Live is also very safe to use as it does not allow to record the audio, denying the culprits to spy on others.
Ear Agent Live amplifies the sound from your devices microphone and put directly to your ears through headphones.

It allows you to listen the world around you better. It allows you to capture the natural sounds more clear. Also allow you to hear more feeble sounds that would have been impossible to hear without Ear Agent Live.

It is fully automatically powered app and do not require any equalizer. It auto adjust according to the audio input coming through microphone.



Please use Ear Agent Live responsibly and use it to hear better only, not to spy on others!

title: InnoCaption: Real-time Captioned Calls
description:
InnoCaption provides closed captioning of phone conversations at no cost to you, as it is funded by the FCC's Telecommunications Relay Services Fund. Created for the deaf and hard of hearing, InnoCaption empowers you to call anyone, day or night, with fast and accurate real-time captioning. If your hearing loss makes understanding your cell phone calls difficult, our app is the solution for you!

InnoCaption enables you to make or receive a call, speak using your own voice, and see captions of what the other party on the call is saying to you. The speed and accuracy of our service ensures you are able to keep up with your phone conversations. 

InnoCaption is designed to be fully compatible with your mobile phone and tablet - receiving captions for your calls has never been easier! Our patented technology allows you to choose between having your calls transcribed by live stenographers or best-in-class automatic speech recognition anytime during your call.

The InnoCaption team has developed a full set of features to meet our users’ accessibility needs:

• Use the app like your regular phone dialer - no need to make calls through a relay center
• Choose between captioning from live stenographers or automatic speech recognition software
• See captions from your phone mirrored on a computer screen - great for video conference calls! 
• Continue to use your personal cell number by combining our caller ID and call forwarding features 
• Syncs with your existing contacts 
• View and email past call transcripts
• Personalized voicemail with captions 
• Call blocking from unwanted and spam numbers 
• Make 911 emergency calls with captions* 

*911 Calling Advisory: Calling 911 from a landline is the most reliable method of reaching emergency response personnel. Please visit our 911 calling education page to find out more about using the InnoCaption app to access 911: https://www.innocaption.com/calling-911/

Cellular data plan or Wi-Fi is required for usage.

FEDERAL LAW PROHIBITS ANYONE BUT REGISTERED USERS WITH HEARING LOSS FROM USING THE DEVICE WITH CAPTIONS ON.

For more information, visit us at https://www.innocaption.com
Please reach out to us at support@innocaption.com for any assistance

comments: In the end, the app worked very well. I only used it once for testing. I don't like that it asks for all your personal info AND that it assigns you a new phone number in order to use the app, which is a total inconvenience. Now, for important calls, (doctors, schools, hospital, Physical Therapy, etc.) I have to give them this number too. Do I tell all of them to replace my real number with this number or that I now have 2 cell numbers but to use the new number to contact me from now on?

So far registration was smooth and easy. When i went to use the app afterwards and try to long in. It said i had to register, after i already registered. Even after uninstalling an reinstalling it still gave me the same problem
I love this app, great captions. I definitely recommend this for the deaf and hearing impaired such as myself.
great service if person you're calling doesn't transfer you to someone else. Most of the time, my calls get dropped when I am transferred.

I used the interpreter once or twice, then went to the AI service as i was making calls with personal information on them. Ive only just started and its been very reliable. The tutorial on how to set up call forwarding was very helpful. My hearing loss was sudden and this helped me cope very well. I gave 4 stars instead of 5, as it has a hard time understanding people with heavy accents and through masks, and it sucks battery. Have a battery backup with you at all times!

title: Hearing Amplifier
description:
Hearing Amplifier is designed to filter and amplify sound and boost environmental hearing, especially people with hearing loss. 

Hearing Amplifier uses headphone microphone and phone microphone to detect and amplify sound from your surroundings to help you hear better.

Use Hearing Amplifier to boost sound from devices such as Television, Radio, Speaker, Laptop, etc. and improve sound clarity during recreational activities like bird-watching.

Hearing Amplifier can be used in classrooms, churches, meetings, conferences or any setting where you are a distance away from the speaker. It supports Bluetooth and wired headsets.

Hearing Amplifier fine-tunes, augments and amplifies sound to help you communicate effectively and eliminate danger. 

Hearing Amplifier’s sound amplification improves your ability to hear sound without disturbing sleepers.

Hearing Amplifier helps individuals with hearing loss hear better in small group settings and one-on-one conversations.

Hearing Amplifier is an everyday companion for millions of people during conversations at work, and with friends and family.

Use Bluetooth headphones to avoid carrying your phone around.
 
WHY USE HEARING AMPLIFIER
1. Proper hearing leads to better communication.
2. Hearing well leads to positive attitude towards life.
3. Better sound produces better music and video experience.
4. Hearing using Bluetooth connection lets you put your phone away.
5. Better hearing lowers stress levels.
6. Hearing well makes you confident.
7. Enhanced hearing lets you grab opportunities and makes you successful.
8. Better hearing gives the right orientation.
9. Amplified sound lets you detect danger and understand speech.
10. Enjoy natural sounds like birds chirping or leaves rustling.
11. Restore normal hearing levels to help eradicate hearing loss.

HEARING AMPLIFIER FEATURES
1. High-Quality Sound Feedback
2. Echo Cancellation
3. Noise Suppression
4. Sound Recorder
5. Loudness Enhancement
6. Bass Booster
7. Save Configurations
8. Regular Updates

Disclaimer: Hearing Amplifier is not a replacement for medical hearing aids, so always use your medical hearing aid. Consult your audiologist if you’re experiencing hearing loss.

title: Hearing Test Pro
description:
Pure-tone audiometry is the basic hearing examination which determines the degree of hearing loss in relation to the sound frequency.

Hearing Test features:
* pure tone audiometry using bundled headphones and predefined calibration coefficients from the database (possible for systematically increasing number of devices),
* calibration of the device (in the case of lack of predefined coefficients or for headphones other than bundled).

Additional features:
* viewing tests results,
* adding notes to tests results,
* printing of the tests results,
* adjustment of calibration (calibration coefficients may be adjusted on the basis of your audiogram produced using an audiometer).
* verification of calibration coefficients,
* suppressing of the masking noise for the purpose of free field audiometry.

Pro version features:
* local database (offline access to tests results, without connecting to the server),
* synchronization (your tests results can be stored on a remote account, created for a given email address; data are easy to recover, transfer to/from any other mobile or simultaneously synchronize on different devices).

New features (version 27):
* bug fixes

* implementation of the Android security updates
* bug fixes
New features (version 15):
* customization of the test frequencies,
* support for high frequency audiometry,
* estimation of the "hearing age",
* audiogram interpretation: age norms, speech banana,
* optional hiding of results when tested,
* support for new versions of Android: material design, permission adjustments, documents printing
comments: It's one of the best apps for hearing test on Android, I've been using it for a few years now. The developer finally released an update (thanks! it fixed that persistent crash on app closing, appreciate it!) My only gripe is with the calibration UI. The continuous tone calibration is basically useless, since it's hard to set the correct volume by up/down buttons as it keeps moving; it should've been done as a normal hearing test with subsequent value adjustments. Adjusting a test to another audiogram is much better, but the UI for it is very well hidden, and I'm not sure it works as advertised. I tried calibrating another device based on the previous I used, and the results are still widely different on the two devices. I also didn't find a way to store multiple custom adjustments (e.g. for different headphones); that would also be very useful.

Using it in Demo mode, should really be called Uncalibrated mode. Using the same high quality Koss earphones and setup. Allows me to keep a progression chart and do tests after different exposure to loud sounds events. Suits my needs well.
Having been tested several times by professionals (for tinnitus), I think this is a pretty good tool to check for potential issues, and see a professional.
Absolutely fantastic app. this is the same like a professional hearing test.
worked perfectly but just the print out issue and logo issues

title: Hearing Aid Control
description:
This simple application allows control of any hearing aid supporting DTMF tone control, such as Starkeys "T² Remote" enabled hearing aids or Specsavers hearing aids.

Control your hearing aid with only 6 large buttons.

Each button can be individually configured. Assign each button the code sequence valid for your hearing aid. Refer to the hearing aid manufacturer's manual to get the codes valid for your device.

You can also set the number of seconds you want to delay the DTMF tone sequence prior to playback, in order to have time to move the phone to the ear. Default is 2 seconds.

Additionally, you can also set the duration (in milliseconds) between each tone code. Default is 600 milliseconds, configurable in the Settings menu.

Please note that too high volume may damage your ear and hearing!
Test the tone intensity prior to moving the device close to your ear!
The tone volume intensity can be controlled and adjusted with the volume buttons at the side of your phone or tablet.

You can also set vibration at key button press to on (1) or off (0), configurable in the Settings menu.

At start, the application is preconfigured for Starkey hearing aids, but can easily be changed to your codes in the Settings menu.

Search keywords:
T2
SoundLens
Starkey
Specsavers
DTMF
Code
Medical

The tone volume intensity can be controlled and adjusted with the volume buttons at the side of your phone or tablet.

You can also set vibration at key button press to on (1) or off (0), configurable in the Settings menu.

At start, the application is preconfigured for Starkey hearing aids, but can easily be changed to your codes in the Settings menu.

Search keywords:
T2
SoundLens
Starkey
Specsavers
DTMF
Code
Medical
summary: Easily control your hearing aids by DTMF tones (such as Starkeys "T² Remote") .

title: Visualfy - for deaf people
description:
Visualfy is an application principally focused on people with hearing and/or blindness problems, which offers a solution to many notifications we receive daily to our devices and makes it easier for us to get this information in a visual and sensory way in real time.

You could configure a color or a vibration pattern for each notification you receive to your terminal from a whatsapp message reception to the communication of your low battery.

Never again will you know late that they have changed the time of the convention, the doctor's appointment or a meeting of school parents, as these notifications work in real time and you can group and send them to the terminal periodically.

Visualfy is fully adapted to the Spanish sign language and international sign language and also can read and listen to all indications.

Visualfy is not just another app, it is a social project where your participation is very important. We have a different business model, where   barriers become  quarries to build a better future for young people.

Access  www.visualfy.com and find all the information about  our new project.

This is only the beginning. With your help the revolution is a reality. You get access to your notifications in your smartphone or tablet, and you also collaborate with the change for a different future, an accessible future, a future for everybody.

Download Visualfy and join the revolution.

This app uses Accessibility services.

title: EasyListening – Hearing Aid App
description:
EasyListening - Hearing Aid app is a simple and easy to use hearing aid app. It is ideal for a person with hearing loss. It has the following features-

EasyListening - Hearing Aid App comes with a Very simple design.

An Equalizer with different presets is added to Hearing Aid for good hearing.

Hearing Aid App has a sound amplifier designed to improve hearing by making sound audible to a person with hearing loss.

EasyListening - Hearing Aid App automatic stops when headphones/Earphones plugged out.

Hearing Aid app has a Simplified user interface for a person to have good hearing.

EasyListening - Hearing Aid app gives you a feature of Save configuration and loads them whenever you want.

The Hearing Aid App has a recording feature, so Record your audio to listen to them later.

EasyLisening - Hearing Aid App has a sampling frequency (44.1 kHz) providing excellent sound quality for good hearing.

Guidelines are added for the easy use of the application.

The Hearing Aid app comes with Save and loads your desired configuration for good hearing.

Hearing aids are incapable of truly correcting a hearing loss, they are an aid to make sounds more audible.


More features will be added.
EasyListening - Hearing Aid app requires the following permissions for smooth working---

Permissions are required for the smooth working of the Hearing Aid app.

Record permission is required for recording the audio in the Hearing Aid app.

Internet permission is required in the hearing aid app for loading and showing ads.

Storage permission is required in the Hearing Aid app for saving the recorded audio file in internal storage.

Hear your recorded audio from internal storage, stored in file name EasyListening.


If you find any difficulties or have some suggestion for improvement, please feel free to contact us at:vanskrt@gmail.com

title: Indian Hearing Screening Test
description:
Perform a pure tone audiometry test on your cell phone or tablet

Pure tone audiometry (PTA) is the key hearing test used to identify hearing threshold levels of an individual, enabling determination of the degree, type and configuration of a hearing loss. 

Hearing test features:
Test can be performed on paediatric as well as geriatric population. The hearing thresholds of Children less than 5 years also can be determined.

Features:
•	Screening of children from newborn to 5 years age group
•	Self explanatory test results
•	Test results can be saved and emailed
•	Cause of hearing loss can be determined and the probable treatment reviewed
•	Appointment with ENT Doctors in Government institutes

title: Hearing Test
description:
It's recommended that you listen to this using headphones
By listening to specific sound frequency you should be able to determine your hearing level. 

Audiograma is a graph showing the hearing ability of a person and the degree of hearing loss in both ears. At the top of the chart, the numerical values range from 125 to 8000. These numbers represent frequencies, or different pitches.

You are able to determine your age as well by frequency you are hearing. The younger you are the lowest frequency you hear. 

The hearing level can vary because of your age or hearing condition.

CAUTION:
This app  generates  sound frequencies beyond the limits of human hearing. Please avoid unnecessary  exposure time to this sound.

title: Tinnitus relief app. Sound therapy.
description:
Please use headphones for optimal effect. Firstly keep the volume at the level where it seems to be matching your tinnitus then take a minute or two before lowering the volume a bit and keep going until your tinnitus is gone.

Just choose the ambient noise which you like most. Adjust the sound volume rather low so you can still hear the environmental noise.

If you need to mask your tinnitus for a while or have other reasons to listen to relaxing sounds, you can try the all-new noise generator. It provides White, Pink and Brown Noise.
White Noise, Pink Noise and Brown Noise are known to have a relaxing impact on people. Thus, the noise generator can help you relax, concentrate or fall asleep. 

Our free application contains the following sounds:

- Tinnitus Masking Sound.
- Tinnitus Relief Sound.
- Tinnitus sound generator.


Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the natural sounds and relax or sleep better.

Our app has the following features:

- Work offline. You don’t need internet connection.
- Absolutely free.
- You could remove ads for extra money.
- High quality nature sounds.
- Amazing HD background pictures.
- Control playback from the lock screen or notifications menu.
- This has a sleep timer. Only set the timer for 30 minutes and you always asleep before the timer goes off.
- Play sounds in background.
- Mute on incoming calls.
- Free for download mp3 files.
- Individual volume control
- It’s very relaxing!

This audio application is for those who:

- Want sleep better.
- Doing yoga exercises and meditation.
- Learn to breath correctly.
- Want to get rid of stress and anxiety.
- Improve concentration.

Tinnitus is the perception of noise or ringing in the ears. A common problem, tinnitus affects about 15 to 20 percent of people. Tinnitus isn't a condition itself — it's a symptom of an underlying condition.

You have tinnitus that occurs suddenly or without an apparent cause.You have hearing loss or dizziness with the tinnitus. Common causes of tinnitus: Age-related hearing loss, Exposure to loud noise, Earwax blockage, Ear bone changes.

comments: I don't often leave reviews, but this app is really effective. I've been using it an hour or two a day while listening to audio books and it already is making a huge difference.

Absolutely different! From the moment i turned it on i felt calm. My chest felt strange but i relaxed and soon felt to sleep! Ive been having tinnitus over a month these sounds are so high! From swooshing to squeeling, synthisizing sounds! Then dija-vues...i may have vertigo but this app has upon first use showed me i can have some calm in my head!
I was skeptical, but it works. Only two of the sounds worked completely, but two is better than none.
I have tinnitus in left ear and this really helped. The ringing pretty much disappeared under the tones played and white noise
One sound works particularly well for me. My tinnitus just disappears!

title: Hearing aid, Microphone
description:
DaMIC has the following features:
This feature must be used with speaker, headset or earphone.
Available in both wired and wireless(Bluetooth, WIFI).
Attach external speaker, headset or earphone before you speak.
Try using a sound effect. 
Enjoy the good sound of it.
DaMIC consists of two modes.

[Speaker Mode]
This mode is used as loudspeaker, megaphone or microphone.
1. structure: Connect speakers to the smartphone.
2. explication: 
   1) Touch the Start button in the first mode.
   2) Speaking into the lower part microphone.
   3) Using the volume keys to adjust the volume.
   4) Using as loudspeaker, megaphone or microphone.

[Headset Mode]
This mode is used as hearing aid or stethoscope.
1. structure: Connect headset or earphone to the smartphone.
2. explication: 
   1) Touch the Start button in the second mode.
   2) Place the phone in a suitable place. 
      (In pockets, On near the sound that you want to hear)
   3) Using the volume keys to adjust the volume.
   4) Using as hearing aid or stethoscope.

[Main Features]
  1. There is no functional limitations, is completely free.
  2. Fast response time.
  3. Audio Effects
     - Bass Boost, Equalizer, Reverb
  4. High Quality (CD Quality)
  5. Automatic gain control, automatic noise reduction function is enabled by default as.
  6. Run in background even when the phone is locked.
  7. An easy-to-use and user-friendly UI.
  
[Support]
  If you have an opinion on functions, bug report, trouble report and any other questions, please feel free to contact us by e-mail.
  We will solve the problems and respond to your e-mail as soon as possible.
  e-mail: SoomSoft@SoomSoft.com

title: MEcontrol
description:
The MEcontrol app will expire in March 2020.  A new Miracle-Ear app has been created with enhanced features so that you can realize the full potential of your Miracle-Ear hearing aids.  It is recommended that you install the new Miracle-Ear App at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miracleear.mdapp. Your Hearing Care Specialist can help with connecting your hearing aid.

Volume control

Voice Activity
Remote Microphone

You won't know this until you try to change the hearing aid settings. I've used this app on both Android and iPhone with similar results. Doesn't look like this app is updated regularly.

Too often you have to reset it I. order for it to accurately change and click. I find the bass going down to nothing and I haven't touched it. The app keeps shutting down my bass no matter what even my phone sits on the table. Half the time it works but when it changes settings on it's own I only know when I can't hear right. Don't like it
Really helps when I can put the volume up higher to hear better, but still doesn't change the volume for my husband. I really enjoy it.

I used this app on my i phone and had very little issues but can't get the app to work right on my Samsung which really bites don't wast your time on this app or get your hearing aide tech to help get the thing up and running

I like it its really helpful when u need it most i recommend this for any one with a hearing aid that use MEcontrol u cant go wrong with it well i dont have any issues with the app keep up the good work guys god bless and stay safe

title: Hearing Booster Aid
description:
★★★This is a must app for people with hearing disabilities!★★★

Super Hearing aid app amplifies sound from the microphone straight to your headphones or earphones to give enhanced and crystal like hearing and In this Hearing aid app, We are giving you Two Hearing Amplifiers and One Hearing Music Player. You can increase amplification gain to make your music or sound from the microphone louder without distorting its amplitude and reducing its hissing noise. Whats More, this app as an enhancing tool for hearing impaired can be helpful in communication, education and entertainment...


■ Please Note:
-----------------------------------------------------

Super Hearing aid app is working properly with earphones and Audio latency depends on the model of your device and firmware version. Please Use Earphones otherwise it will cause plenty of echoes !


■ Hearing App Features ?
-----------------------------------------------------

★Two Hearing Aid algorithms.
★Hearing Music Player.
★One Tap to Boost All Volumes.
★Special algorithm to eliminate noise.
★Easy to use - no special devices, no battery replacements
★Provides the best sound quality with Automatic sampling rate selection.
★Full gain up to 30 dB with a standard headset;
★Minimum signal processing delay - just 100 ms



■ How to use this app ?
-----------------------------------------------------

1. Take your earphones and plug into the phone, make sure: you don’t hold your phone very close to the earphones, you don’t hear the feedback loop
2. Place the earphones into your ears.
3. Start raising media volume level and raise the amplify level next.



■ How Does Hearing Aid app work ?
-----------------------------------------------------
it amplifies sound from the microphone straight to your headphones to give enhanced hearing and reduce the noise


■ FAQ
-----------------------------
Q: How to eliminate echo to zero ?
A: Put mobile phone far away from you and use quality earphone.


■ Advertising Policy Disclosure:
-----------------------------
We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever.
In order to keep our development running, Super Hearing Aid is ad-supported to generate some revenue.
Thank you for understanding.

■ Disclaimer:
-----------------------------
Super Hearing Aid app is not approved as a medical device or software and cannot be used as a hearing aid with doctor`s prescription. This app makes sounds very loud. Use common sense and caution. When you download and install this software, you agree that you are going to use this application on your own risk. In no event shall developer be liable for any damages.

title: Deafness Disease: Causes, Diagnosis, and Treatment
description:
Hearing loss, also known as hearing impairment, is a partial or total inability to hear. A deaf person has little to no hearing. Hearing loss may occur in one or both ears. In children hearing problems can affect the ability to learn spoken language and in adults it can cause work related difficulties. In some people, particularly older people, hearing loss can result in loneliness. Hearing loss can be temporary or permanent.
Hearing loss may be caused by a number of factors, including: genetics, ageing, exposure to noise, some infections, birth complications, trauma to the ear, and certain medications or toxins.[2] A common condition that results in hearing loss is chronic ear infections.[2] Certain infections during pregnancy such as syphilis and rubella may also cause hearing loss in the child.[2]Hearing loss is diagnosed when hearing testing finds that a person is unable to hear 25 decibels in at least one ear. Testing for poor hearing is recommended for all newborns. Hearing loss can be categorised as mild, moderate, moderate-severe, severe, or profound. There are three main types of hearing loss, conductive hearing loss, sensorineural hearing loss, and mixed hearing loss. 
==========================
APP FEATURES
==========================
This exclusive app will help to understand the Deafness symptoms, Deafness Management & Deafness causes.
Here are features that make this app better than all other Deafness Disease apps - 
-	UI of app is very user responsive and easy to navigate. 
-	Easily Change the page.
-	Data of app is collected from various research reports.
-	You can access these favorites whenever you want.
-	Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family through email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

All these features are available for free. 

==========================
SAY HELLO
==========================
Any medical information published on this app is not intended as a substitute for informed medical advice and you should not take any action before consulting with a healthcare professional. Our team are nonstop working hard on creation this app. Please feel free to review and email us for any questions/suggestions/complications.
descriptionHTML:
Hearing loss, also known as hearing impairment, is a partial or total inability to hear. A deaf person has little to no hearing. Hearing loss may occur in one or both ears. In children hearing problems can affect the ability to learn spoken language and in adults it can cause work related difficulties. In some people, particularly older people, hearing loss can result in loneliness. Hearing loss can be temporary or permanent.
Hearing loss may be caused by a number of factors, including: genetics, ageing, exposure to noise, some infections, birth complications, trauma to the ear, and certain medications or toxins.[2] A common condition that results in hearing loss is chronic ear infections.[2] Certain infections during pregnancy such as syphilis and rubella may also cause hearing loss in the child.[2]Hearing loss is diagnosed when hearing testing finds that a person is unable to hear 25 decibels in at least one ear. Testing for poor hearing is recommended for all newborns. Hearing loss can be categorised as mild, moderate, moderate-severe, severe, or profound. There are three main types of hearing loss, conductive hearing loss, sensorineural hearing loss, and mixed hearing loss.
==========================
APP FEATURES
==========================
This exclusive app will help to understand the Deafness symptoms, Deafness Management & Deafness causes.
Here are features that make this app better than all other Deafness Disease apps -
- UI of app is very user responsive and easy to navigate.
- Easily Change the page.
- Data of app is collected from various research reports.
- You can access these favorites whenever you want.
- Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family through email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

All these features are available for free.

==========================
SAY HELLO
==========================
Any medical information published on this app is not intended as a substitute for informed medical advice and you should not take any action before consulting with a healthcare professional. Our team are nonstop working hard on creation this app. Please feel free to review and email us for any questions/suggestions/complications.
summary: Read about Deafness Causes, Diagnosis, Treatment, and what are prevents

title: Miracle-Ear
description:
The Miracle-Ear app helps you adjust quickly and easily to using your hearing aids. It explains how to use all their capabilities, and provides advice and recommendations on how to wear, clean and maintain them. It is compatible with all Miracle-Ear hearing aids that have Bluetooth(R) technology.
 
Use this app to:
•            Quickly change the volume, programs and directionality 
•            Maximize the full potential of your hearing aids 
•            Track how you are adjusting to your hearing aids
•            Get the latest hearing health news and advice on hearing aid maintenance
•            Book and manage your appointments at Miracle-Ear centers 

Find out about your hearing aids
The Miracle-Ear app gives you an introduction to your hearing aids’ technical capabilities, and shows you how to adjust them to meet your specific needs, lifestyle and hearing preferences.
 
Organize your life
The app makes it quick and easy to book, change or cancel your appointments at Miracle-Ear centers. It also keeps you updated on upcoming appointments and evaluates your experience with Miracle-Ear.
 
See how well you are adjusting 
The Miracle-Ear app helps you every step of the way while you are adjusting to your hearing aids. The app is your virtual companion, providing advice and tips to make it as easy as possible.

Take care of your hearing aids
The app shows you how to properly care for your hearing aids. From daily cleaning to annual check-ups, the app explains exactly what you should do and when.
 
Miracle-Ear: helping you live your life to the fullest through better hearing
Miracle-Ear has been a leader in hearing healthcare since 1948. Our goal is to help each customer realize the full potential of their passions, relationships and life. What's most important to us is the relationships built with each person that walks into one of our 1,500 locations nationwide. From your initial free hearing evaluation to your lifetime of aftercare, we’re here for you every step of the way. 

Follow us on social media
“Like” us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/miracleear/
 
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/c/miracleear

title: ReSound Tinnitus Relief
description:
The ReSound Relief™ app uses a combination of sounds and relaxing exercises that aim to distract your brain from focusing on tinnitus.  Over time the brain learns to focus less on the tinnitus. 

The app lets you manage your personal library of sound therapy files and allows you to create your own soundscapes from environmental sounds and small pieces of music. It will also track your usage, so you can see which sounds work best for you, and it contains some secondary stimuli like colors and exercises to help keep your mind occupied. 

Just download it and listen to it as you normally listen to music from your smart phone. If you wear ReSound® wireless hearing aids, you can stream directly through them; the sound you stream will be adjusted to compensate for your hearing loss.

The app is a tool for anyone who has tinnitus. It should be used in combination with a tinnitus management programme or plan set up by a hearing care professional.


SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

ReSound Tinnitus Relief offers two auto-renewing subscription options for My Plan:
$6.99 USD per month
$69.99 USD per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. To manage your subscription, go to Subscriptions menu inside Google Playstore app. Your account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Unused portion of the free trial is forfeited after purchase. All purchases are final.

Read more about our privacy policy and terms of use:
https://www.resound.com/privacy-policy
